Sam slammed the book shut the sudden noise making Dean jump. â€œNo Dean! It says here it leaves footprints with a cleft hoof and a birdâ€™s claw!â€  Dean who was sprawled lazily on a nearby chair flipped a page of a tattered comic book with a dismissive snort. â€œBig whoop. Probably just some oversized possum scaring the locals.â€  Sam scowled. â€œDad takes all these things seriously Dean. Why canâ€™t you?â€  â€œLook Sammyâ€ Dean said sitting up a little straighter â€œDadâ€™s got the experience. He knows things and heâ€™s seen them before but I bet heâ€™d think weâ€™re a bunch of idiots for this. Thereâ€™s no point in getting our hopes up on finding some winged demon goat. I donâ€™t even think theyâ€™re real.â€  Samâ€™s shoulders slumped. He understood Deanâ€™s logic but something about the legend of the Demon Goat the mystery of it all sparked a thrill in him. He longed to be a part of his dadâ€™s world not forgotten in some random town and some random backwoods motel.  â€œMaybe notâ€ Sam mumbled more to himself than Dean. â€œBut wouldnâ€™t it be cool if there was something out there? This would be my first hunt. Maybe Dad would come back and help usâ€”help me.â€  Deanâ€™s playful facade faltered for a moment. He looked at Sam a flicker of worry crossing his features.  â€œYeah it wouldâ€ he finally admitted his voice softer than usual. â€œBut right now our job is to stick with what Dadâ€™s instructed us. We stay here and wait for him to come get us. Weâ€™re a team remember?â€  Sam met Deanâ€™s gaze a spark of determination replacing the disappointment in his eyes. â€œYeah a teamâ€ he echoed a small smile playing on his lips. He didnâ€™t know if theyâ€™d ever encounter the Demon Goat but one thing was clearâ€”theyâ€™d face whatever came their way together.  â€œAlright then Van Helsingâ€ Dean said a mischievous glint in his eyes â€œletâ€™s see if this book of yours mentions any weaknesses for giant demon goats.â€  Sam couldnâ€™t help but grin. Iâ€™m rewatching Supernatural from the start and I may have cracked why the early seasons are so dear to me (or well there are many reasons but this is one more).   Sam and Dean are humane in a way they are not in the later years. Thereâ€™s a different kind of darkness in them because there is also their humanity to counteract their job of killing: they struggle to kill (Croatoan). They feel bad when people get killed - they care about the people demons possess. They have a hard life and it shows. In Croatoan when they think Sam is about to die Dean says heâ€™s tired. In season two that poor boy is tired of the life and wants to take a break from it. To think of all the things he hasnâ€™t been through yetâ€¦.   Donâ€™t get me wrong I do like some parts of the later seasons. I love hoe dysfunctionally codependent Sam and Dean are and how nothing no one is worth losing the other. Not even the world. There is something about that isnâ€™t there?   But I miss those twenty-something boys who still have humanity in them. They feel more real. There is a familiarity to their struggle - all of us have felt like bad human beings once or twice. They prank and laugh and bicker in a way that feels true. Donâ€™t get me started on the bitch-jerk of those early times either because ARGH.   But by going bigger and more extreme every season that reality gets pushed aside. They suddenly carry the whole worldâ€™s fate on their shoulders (and Dean was already tired before he made the deal and before he knew about angels! Come on show) and that makes them harder to reach as human beings. Their struggle is so far away from normal that it loses something. Itâ€™s harder to relate to.   And that is why I will always love the early seasons. The gritty horror of people who feel real not the supernatural soap opera it turned into.

post_body: ğ…ğšğ¦ğ¢ğ¥ğ¢ğšğ« ğ…ğšğœğğ¬ ğˆğ§ ğƒğšğ§ğ ğğ«ğ¨ğ®ğ¬ ğğ¥ğšğœğğ¬  â†³ summary: gabriel is dead set on killing loki but ezra finds the trickster first. persuasive is one word to describe him. deadly is another.  â†³ warnings: fighting and violence  â†³ notes: based on the season thirteen episode â€˜unfinished buisnessâ€™ with my character ezra. all you should know before reading is that he was extremely pissed at gabriel for running off after finishing with asmodeus. click here for an extensive look at who ezra is! enjoy  â†³ song: mad iq'sâ€”i donâ€™t know how but they found me   sona masterlist | commissions | carrd  <!-- more --> The hotel floorboards creaked underneath Ezraâ€™s feet as he padded down the hallways.  He knew that they had come to the the right placeâ€” that Loki was here. It hadnâ€™t been hard to narrow that down once Gabriel had opened the elevator doors and started what had practically been a shootout straight from a movie; complete with the flickering lights and all. Unless the hotel owners here took the safety of their guests very seriously there was no other explanation for why the upper floor had been crawling with armed gunmen. Not that any of the owners could probably afford gunman anyway. All the buildings Dean had passed in Baby on the way here had been sagging with old age and the one Ezra was currently prowling around in was no different.  It was too cold too ugly and too quiet for a place that was supposed to be housing the trickster of all tricksters but he figured thatâ€™s what Loki would want his pursuers to think. So he pushed on.  Ezra paused as he turned another corner realizing he had gone in a loop. Four left turns in a row. That means he should be back where he started only that wasnâ€™t the case. Instead of the rusty elevator that he Sam Dean and Gabriel had made their grand entrance and then consequently split up from there was a nice set of pearly white doors staring him down. A part of Ezra felt calm at the sight. Like he should be opening them and stepping into whatever lay behind without a second thought. Trust me the white wood whispered. Iâ€™m your friend.  The other part of him turned around to catch Lokiâ€™s hand before he could stab him in the back.  â€œWhoops. You caught me.â€  Ezraâ€™s eyes widened a fraction of an inch at the carbon copy of Gabriel that stared back at him. Gabriel had said that heâ€™d taken on Lokiâ€™s face when heâ€™d gone into hiding from heaven but Ezra didnâ€™t expect him to have meant that literally.  â€œLoki?â€  â€œI have to hand it to you kid. Youâ€™re smarter than you look.â€  Ezraâ€™s gaze snapped down to Lokiâ€™s wrist as he felt it begin to dematerialize in his grip. Wisps of thin smoke danced in front of his eyes and suddenly the god wasnâ€™t there anymore.  â€œSo you are the infamous Azrael Basil.â€ Ezra turned his gun in the direction Lokiâ€™s voice was coming from now and it ended up somewhere over his right shoulder before he could fully turn around. Lokiâ€™s smug smile was waiting for him in the meantime mouth enclosed around a sweet treat that Ezra had seen in Gabrielâ€™s own grasp many a times.  â€œHeard a lot about you.â€ Loki finished bringing the sucker away from his mouth with a loud pop maintaining eye contact with Ezra as he did so. The lewdness of the action made Ezraâ€™s rough expression dip into uncertain waters for a moment before snapping back to its original state.  â€œHope Iâ€™m living up to the legend.â€ He managed to keep his voice devoid of emotions. The barrel of his gun was set dead center at Lokiâ€™s forehead but he didnâ€™t pull the trigger. Not yet.  â€œWell thatâ€™s for me to decide and for you to find out isnâ€™t it?â€ Loki spread his arms with a fancy flourish a crooked smile making itself at home on his face. Twirling the sucker stick in between his fingers he plucked a black case out of thin air and opened it placing the candy alongside its brothers in one quick move.  â€œIs that a lollipop holster?â€ Ezra opened his mouth before he could think to stop and regretted asking the moment Lokiâ€™s eyes swept over him in a playful manner.  â€œArenâ€™t you the perceptive one?â€ He grinned scratching absentmindedly at the stubble on his chin. â€œWant a taste?â€ He shook the case in Ezraâ€™s direction with a quirk of his eyebrow.  â€œNo thanks.â€ The gun in his hands was gripped tighter. â€œI donâ€™t exactly have stupid written on my forehead.â€  Loki didnâ€™t answer. His grin just got bigger.  â€œIâ€™m going to ignore your silence and hope that I donâ€™t have anything written on my face now.â€  â€œBoo. Youâ€™re no fun.â€ He sighed. With a snap the case was sent away and Ezraâ€™s muscles pulled tight at the sound.  â€œRelax for a moment would ya? Iâ€™m not going to kill you just yet. Iâ€™ve been dying to meet you.â€ Loki rolled his eyes to an invisible audience as if to say 'can you believe this guyâ€™ before unbuttoning the coat on his suit. The flaps fell away to reveal a pinstriped shirt underneath that went wonderfully with the hat placed carefully on a pile of golden curls and Ezra took a split second to look down at his own outfit with a frown. Clearly he had gone into this mission a bit underdressed if the various holes peppered in his shirt said anything.  â€œOh donâ€™t feel bad.â€ Loki waved his hand as if he could read Ezraâ€™s mind. â€œI could snap you up some new digs in no time flat if youâ€™d like.â€  â€œNo thanks.â€ Ezra resisted the urge to clear his throat clearly thrown off by the offer. â€œTheyâ€™d just get bloody.â€  â€œYou sure?â€ Loki raised an eyebrow yet again. He didnâ€™t seem very phased by the not so hidden threat.  â€œI could get you whatever youâ€™d like and Iâ€™m not just talking about clothes. A smart guy like you should be able to pick up on the offer Iâ€™m laying down here.â€  Silence.  â€œYouâ€™re going to make me do all the work for you arenâ€™t you?â€ Loki groaned with a comical touch to it. â€œLet me break it down. Me: an age old god. Father of deception. The trickster of all tricksters. Okay got it?â€ He sent a look in Ezraâ€™s direction clapping his hands happily without waiting for an answer. â€œAnd you: an extremely killable human with a bit of a habit of ending the world. Not exactly the fairest of fights now is it?â€  â€œSomething tells me youâ€™re not looking to make this fight fair.â€ Ezra hummed. Loki grinned in response.  â€œYouâ€™re only partially right. Look Iâ€™m thinking we can help each other out.â€ Lokiâ€™s complacent grin rivaled that of even the best salesman in the world.  â€œWord on the street is youâ€™re looking for a gateway into another reality. Now you could go about it the hard way like I know you have been orâ€”â€ He held up a single finger pausing â€œâ€”or you could let me help you. All I ask in return is for you to betray those thankless idiots you call friends when itâ€™s all over. Maybe even kill one of them. A simple trade no? And you wonâ€™t even have to sell your soul.â€  â€œOh no Iâ€™ll just throw away a decade of comradery for some has-been with an ego. Easy peasy right?â€  â€œNo need for name calling. Here I thought we were being civilâ€ Lokiâ€™s expressions darkened like the sky before a storm. It took him a second to get it back to a look of charm and eager promises. â€œCome on kiddo. You canâ€™t tell me youâ€™ve never thought of leaving those suckers behind. Odin knows that theyâ€™d trade you for the chance to find their mommy in a heart beat.â€  Ezra felt his grip falter.  â€œYou know Iâ€™m right.â€ Loki beamed. â€œWhat do you say? Letâ€™s make a deal.â€  The seconds stretched on as Ezraâ€™s eyes searched his face. Looking for something to cling onto. A lie a truth anything at all.  He dug his feet into the carpeted floor heartily.  "Interesting offer but I think Iâ€™m going to have to decline.â€ He sent a falsely saccharine smile Lokiâ€™s way and cocked his gun with a firm click. â€œI donâ€™t make deals with douche wads.â€  â€œWell if thatâ€™s how youâ€™re going to be..â€ Loki let his sentence trail off with a sigh taking off his hat and placing it down on the hallway stand next to him haphazardly. It was a calm and collected movement and Ezra felt the tension roll off of it in waves. â€œCanâ€™t say I didnâ€™t try!â€  Without so much as a warning Lokiâ€™s hand shot out and Ezra felt himself being thrown backwards as his gun went flying.  One of the hallwaysâ€™ rotted walls splintered under the weight of his back as he made sudden contact with it his elbows and the heels of his feet knocking against its surface painfully. They yelped at the feeling and it was louder than theyâ€™d like to admit.  He had enough of his bearings together as he scrambled up using the wall behind him as a crutch all the while to realize that Loki didnâ€™t even have to touch him to hurt him. A part of his brain yelled that hurting Loki wouldnâ€™t be as easy as he thought either. That was all but confirmed as he went to take a swing at the god just for his fist to be caught in an iron grip.  Loki wiggled his eyebrows and Ezra swallowed.  This time there was nowhere behind Ezra for his body to go flying so he just hit the wall with a loud noise before sliding down the length of it again.  â€œYou know I see a lot of myself in you.â€ Loki tapped his chin as he looked down at a dazed Ezra. He watched as they shakily reached for their gun that they had dropped but kicked it away at the last moment with an 'ah-ah-ahâ€™ noise. Wagging his finger at them in a no no motion wasnâ€™t necessary but Loki took joy in the disgust Ezra displayed at the childish chiding.  â€œLike I said I see myself when I look at you.â€ Loki gripped Ezra by his jaw squishing his cheeks together as he brought the man to standing height; and then some. Ezra made a noise that could have been identical to a garbage disposal in any other situation and clawed at Lokiâ€™s hands. His fingernails left soft pink trails in their wake and it only took him a second to figure out that whatever he was doing wasnâ€™t working.  â€œAmbitious dashing good looks youngâ€”â€ Loki cut himself off with a wistful sigh. â€œOkay maybe Iâ€™m stretching the young thing but you have to admit I donâ€™t look a day over ten thousand!â€  Ezra opened his mouth for a slow moment like he was about to say something. Loki raised an eyebrow and leaned in slightly possibly in an attempt to hear whatever garbled nonsense the hunter would try to get out before his teeth grit together in a cry of pain.  Ezra dropped from Lokiâ€™s hold and took little time in scrambling away. His gun had since returned to his hand at that point thanks to some sneaky shimmying and he silently thanked Sam for having the hindsight to load the weapon with well the ammo that he did. Whatever those bullets were made of they worked. At least well enough to distract a god.  Looking down Loki saw the smoking hole in one of his shoes and smelled his own blood in the air. His nostrils flared in poorly concealed anger as he barked out a harsh laugh recovering quickly while flicking his arms out to tighten the fabric of his sleeves around them.  â€œOh now youâ€™ve done it.â€ Loki chuckled. There was no humor behind the sound this time.  If you asked him later Ezra would tell you that he blacked out a little at that point. That the next few minutes were filled with the blur of thrown punches and heavily drawn blood. But heâ€™d be lying.  Ezra counted every blow sent his way and every swing he took of his own. For each punch he sent in Lokiâ€™s direction twice as many were sent back. Each strategic kick was met with five more at full force beating him down until eventually Ezra got sloppy. Sloppy enough for Loki to twist behind him arm situating itself around his neck like a boa constrictor and forcing him to his knees. Ezra knelt on the carpet trapped in a headlock and struggling for air as Loki laughed.  â€œI know all about you Azrael.â€ Lokiâ€™s breath was hot and heavy along the side of Ezraâ€™s face as he gripped his neck squeezing harder with each passing sentence. â€œHow do you think I knew just what to offer you back there hm? Your pal Gabriel? Before I sent him away to Asmodeus? He was reallll chatty about you and your pals. You three must have made some sort of an impression on him.â€ His knuckles tightened in their grip spreading a ghoulish white quality across the stretched expanse of skin over them.  Ezra choked some more.  â€œHe talked a lot about some of your deepest darkest secrets. Poor guy does feel bad for what he did to you you know. But heâ€™d never admit it. Has to keep things professional and all that. Iâ€™m sure you understand.â€ Loki flashed an award winning grin. He could have been accepting an award on some stage at that moment not choking the life out of someone.  Ezra did in fact understand. That urge to have people fill in the gaps for you because once you said what you were really thinking it became true and not some urge you shoved down. He really did understand that. Or he might have if it wasnâ€™t for the crushing pressure around his windpipe.  It took him a moment to be able to focus on anything other than the lack of air getting through to his brain and once he did he realized it was because Loki had taken a step back. Cold fingers were still wrapped around his throat hard enough to keep him on his knees but at least Ezra didnâ€™t feel like he was being suffocated anymore.  â€œYou talk too much.â€ He wheezed. It was a barely audible sound but he could practically feel the way Lokiâ€™s face soured.  â€œI know how left behind you feel Ezra. How left behind you are. I know that youâ€™d do anything to have the connection that Dean and Sam do with somebody. Thatâ€™s why you give so many people second chances isnâ€™t it? Crowley Castiel Rowena and now even our own little Gabriel. When will you learn Ezra. Youâ€™re damaged goods. Not even second rate. Try third. Itâ€™s just sad at this point.â€  To punctuate his sentence Loki sent a punch straight at Ezraâ€™s nose. His head snapped back with a sickening crack hitting the stained wallpaper behind him with too much force to be okay. Something wet and bitter tasting filled the cavern of his mouth slowly and Ezra knew without having to feel around that heâ€™d bit off a chunk of his tongue. That was going to be a bitch to heal later; if there even was a later.  â€œI mean really what did you think you were going to do to me hm?â€ Loki made a sucking noise with his teeth and rolled his eyes. â€œYouâ€™re supposed to be the one with common sense! Sure the four of you knuckle draggers come in here kill my sons and then me blah blah blah. But coming after me all by yourself? Rookie mistake killer.â€  It was tough for Ezra to pull it together enough to lift his head up. His movements felt sluggishâ€” like he was surrounded in a thick layer of molasses. But he managed situating his head upright enough to get a good look at Lokiâ€™s face.  â€œI really must have done a number on you if youâ€™re smiling at a time like this.â€ Loki mirrored Ezraâ€™s toothy grin with a condescending air albeit his a little less bloody than the other manâ€™s.  â€œNope.â€ Ezra laughed with a high pitch to it some blood spraying out of his mouth in a fine mist at the action. â€œJust happy to have a front row seat.â€  Loki barely had enough time to realize what Ezra meant before Gabriel was on him pulling the trickster away from Ezra and throwing him across the small room. Sam and Dean poured into the hallway soon after the former wasting no time in crouching down to drape Ezraâ€™s arm around his shoulders and then away from the fight while Dean shuffled alongside them with a limp of his own.  Sam asked them a question and then asked it again in a louder tone when Ezra didnâ€™t respond. He was too busy watching the fight between Loki and Gabriel as they circled each other. The energy radiating off of them reminded Ezra of an alley cat fight only if the alley cats were two superpowered beings that shared the same face. But like before with Loki it was his words that really caught Ezraâ€™s attention more than anything. Specifically the way they were directed as Gabriel with such deadly force and accuracy.  â€œPoor Gabriel. With his dead beat Daddy and his mean older brothers.â€  A kick was sent to Gabrielâ€™s ribs. He was sprawled on the floor now caught off guard at some point in the stand off. Sam and Dean only watched. They knew better than to get involved in this fight.. They all knew that Gabriel had come here to kill Loki on his own even if that meant he got hurt in the process. Or worse.  â€œWho will help me! Who will save me!â€ Loki mocked Gabriel cruelly.  Another kick.  â€œI did.â€ Lokiâ€™s voice contained nothing but pure rage as he pulled a similar move on Gabriel like the one he had done with Ezra earlier. The archangelâ€™s toes skimmed the ground as he was hoisted in the air by his coat lapels nose brushing against Lokiâ€™s similarly shaped one.  â€œBut you couldnâ€™t keep one single promise. And then you had the audacity to ask me to help you? Again?â€ They tumbled backward in a streak of furious red and black.  Ezra found he could no longer see either Gabriel or Loki over Samâ€™s height so he shifted in his grip to catch sight of the two of them again stopping only when Sam squeezed him around the middle. A sign to hold still.  â€œYou think I deserve to die for your spinelessness?â€ They heard Loki all but spit. His face was red and his finely combed hair was now frizzed up like a madmanâ€™s no doubt having been mussed up in one of the two fights he had picked this evening. â€œThat my sons deserve to die?â€  Gabriel was shoved into another wall yet again.  â€œOf course.â€ Loki licked his lips lowering his voice to a timbre that only Gabriel could hear. â€œOf course you would need someone to swoop in and save your pitiful ass.â€  â€œShut up.â€ Gabriel managed to get those two words unlodged from his throat only to have Loki toss him away once again. Ezra had a fleeting thought that he could have been the god of throwing people across the room in another life but his attempt at humor was lost even on himself.  The two grappled for one more moment until eventually when the dust settled it was Gabriel that had the upper hand this time. His left palm was digging into Lokiâ€™s chest keeping him in place as the wooden sword heâ€™d brought to the battle lay digging into Lokiâ€™s front. A promise of what was to come.  â€œFace it old friend.â€ Even with the threat of death looming over him Loki couldnâ€™t shut up. Fueled by an anger like no other he continued. â€œYouâ€™re a joke. Youâ€™re a failure. You live for pleasure and you stand for nothing.â€ Lokiâ€™s eyes flickered over to Ezra and the Winchesterâ€™s at that. â€œAnd in the end? Thatâ€™s exactly what youâ€™ll die for.â€  Nobody said anything as Gabriel stared into eyes that were an exact replica of his own right down to the rage and fear that threatened to boil over at all times.  â€œYou first.â€ Gabriel whispered.  Lokiâ€™s body slid off of the end of the katana as Gabriel pulled it back. It slumped to the floor in a lifeless heap; an uneventful end to a very rough fight.  The archangel didnâ€™t turn to look over at the audience heâ€™d collected for a long while and when he did it was only to nod. A sign that it was over. Loki was really dead and that he had completed what heâ€™d set out to do.  â€œCome on we should go.â€ Deanâ€™s voice was gruff with the command but nobody moved. It was like they were all under some sort of spell watching Gabriel with bated breath as his eyes flickered to Ezraâ€™s.  â€œLoki. He offered you everything youâ€™re fighting for. All you had to do was betray me.â€ Gabriel hesitated with his words for a moment. He licked his lips almost nervously. â€œWhy didnâ€™t you?â€  Ezra saw Sam and Dean look at him from the corner of his eye in a confused motion. He inhaled sharply. Ezra wasnâ€™t all that surprised that Gabriel had overheard what he and Loki had been talking aboutâ€” in fact he would go out of his way to say that Gabriel had heard the whole damn thing â€”but knowing and actually talking about what had been said was a whole other thing.  They winced as they pulled themself up to their full height making a noise of pain in the process they hoped was quiet enough to pass as a weird sigh. Judging on the concerned face Dean pulled it didnâ€™t.  â€œNot that I owe it to you to explain myself butâ€”â€ He cut Gabriel off from whatever he was about to say with a stern look â€œâ€”you of all people should understand. Family sucks right? You said it yourself. I lost mine a long time ago so I got my friends instead.â€ He stopped to look at Sam who was still letting Ezra hang off of him. Somewhere else in the hallway he knew Dean was listening too and spoke a little louder so he could be able to hear.  â€œEven if theyâ€™re stupid sometimes or a lot of the time theyâ€™re all I know. Betraying them would be like betraying the only people around that still have my back. And like I told that little shit Loki earlier I donâ€™t exactly have stupid written on my face.â€  A pregnant pause filled the room following his words. Ezra watched as an array of emotions flickered across everyone faces; from pride and relief on Samâ€™s face to a steely but quiet respect on Gabrielâ€™s. Ezra was sure he was displaying some of his own in the moment and took a shaky breath.  There was another moment of comfortable silence before Dean broke it.  â€œHey Ez? Listen about the whole stupid not being written on your face thingâ€”â€  Ezra jerked his arm away from Sam as his hand flew up to touch his forehead. Pulling it back he found black ink staining the tips of his fingertips and let out a strangled noise of anger.  â€œOh come on!â€  Gabrielâ€™s face broke out into a smile as Dean laughed heartily. With red ears Ezra threw his hands up. The pain in his body was too busy being masked with embarrassment for him to care.  â€œWas anybody going to tell me that or were you all just going to let me walk out into the street looking like this!?â€  â€œWell I mean your hair covers most of itâ€”â€  â€œGabriel donâ€™t finish that sentence.â€ Sam closed his eyes and laughed like he couldnâ€™t believe the conversation he was having. â€œWeâ€™ll get you cleaned up back in the car Ezra. For now letâ€™s get out of here before police respond to a call about gunshots.â€  With a reluctant grumble Ezra pulled the front of his beanie down further bringing it to the top of his eyebrows and hoping that did enough to cover the black writing.  â€œI really hope that asshole didnâ€™t make it permanent.â€  â€œOh you have to let me get a picture if thatâ€™s true.â€  â€œSo help me god I will kill you Deanâ€”â€

post_body: Youâ€™re scared. Itâ€™s okay. I understand. See when I was your age I saw something real bad happen to my mom and I was scared too. I didnâ€™t feel like talking just like you. But see my momâ€”I know she wanted me to be brave. I think about that every day. And I do my best to be brave. And maybe your dad wants you to be brave too.

post_body: First Kiss?  Series Masterlist   Summary: Y/N was just told by Sam that cooties arenâ€™t real so she thought it would be funny to bother Dean about it.     Y/N is 7 years old Sam is 7 years old Dean is 11 years old.     BASED ON:     The Old Testament Series.     Genesis Primis: A Supernatural Rewrite (Dean Winchester x Reader) by @dianawinchester03      (Remember that they are KIDS itâ€™s just a harmless innocent peck)     ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹     <!-- more -->   â€œNo way!â€ Y/N exclaimed in surprise her palms pressed to her cheeks. â€œYes way! Sally-Ray told me!â€ Sam giggled mischievously â€œBut Daddy told me they were nasty and boys carried themâ€ Y/N laughed. â€œNuh-uhâ€ Sam shook his head â€œBut how are you so sureâ€¦â€ Y/N narrowed her eyes at Sam his cheeks flushed pink. Then realization dawned on her      â€œYOU DIDNT!â€ She pushed him slightly earning a cheeky smile from Sam. â€œYou had your first kiss Sammyyyy. Luckkyyyâ€ Y/N cooed â€œWhatâ€™s going on in here?â€ Dean walked in through the front door to see Sam and Y/N gossiping on the couch Bobby was in the kitchen making breakfast for them while Dean was out playing in the yard.     â€œSammy just told me cooties arenâ€™t real!â€ Y/N giggled â€œYou snitch that was supposed to me a secretâ€ Sam gasped whispering to her. â€œIâ€™m sure he already knowsâ€ She whispered back both looking over to Dean who had a puzzled and dumbfounded look on his face. â€œH-heâ€™s lyingâ€ Dean stuttered walking in to rest his action figure down on the coffee table.     Y/N and her best friend shared a mischievous look â€œCharminggggâ€¦..tag youâ€™re it!â€ She shoved Dean lightly before running out into the yard Dean laughed loudly running behind his friend. â€œBe careful you little idjits! Or your daddies are gonna have my head if you get hurtâ€ Bobby called out from the kitchen waving his spatula an apron wrapped around his beer gut with one hand propped on his hip as he flipped the pancakes. Y/N ran past him through the back door.     â€œCome â€˜mere princess Iâ€™m not gonna hurt you!â€ Dean laughed chasing after her. Y/Nâ€™s little feet could only carry her so far. So Dean caught up to her tapping her on your shoulder â€œYouâ€™re it!â€ Dean giggled y/n smiled widely and Deans face dropped â€œOh no you donâ€™t!â€ He stuttered running away as she chased after him â€œCome onnn Dean I know cooties arenâ€™t real anymoreâ€ She chased after him Dean was heavy on his feet.      The breath in his lungs slowly diminished as tire took him over. He crouched behind one of the old scrap cars peering up slightly to make sure she wasnâ€™t around. He realized he was dead wrong when a little girl tackled him using the moves her daddy thought her â€œI caught you!â€ Y/N giggled â€œNot fair! Youâ€™re not supposed to tackle in tagâ€ Dean defended as he got up from the ground dusting himself off.     â€œSnooze you lose charmingâ€ She smiled widely outstretching her hand for Dean to help her up. Dean took her hand without hesitation only to be pulled to the floor again. â€œOof!â€ Dean exclaimed with a laugh as he hit the floor with a thud. â€œ0-2â€ Y/N teased. â€œSeriously princess not fair!â€ Dean exclaimed crossing his arms with a pout. â€œAwww donâ€™t be a sour loserâ€ She reached over to pat his head.     Both still sprawled out on the ground â€œHey Dean? Is it true? Are cooties really not real?â€ Y/N asked curiously as they both pushed themselves up dusting their hands. â€œI donâ€™t knowâ€ Dean mumbled shrugging. â€œI havenâ€™t kissed anyoneâ€ His head dropped in a bit of shame â€œItâ€™s okay I havenâ€™t eitherâ€ Y/N assured her friend and then an idea crossed her mind.     â€œHey why donâ€™t we do it??â€ She smiled brightly the innocence protruding off of her. Deans jaw dropped gulping slightly â€œW-what?â€ His eyes widen â€œYou know? We are friends and I trust you. I wouldnâ€™t want it to be with anyone elseâ€¦unless you want it to be someone elseâ€ She pouted a bit not feeling stupid for suggesting it. â€œNo no. Itâ€™s not thatâ€¦I just thought you and Sam liked each otherâ€ Dean pulled his knees to his chest.     â€œNo! Ew no wayâ€ Y/N exclaimed with a light laugh â€œSamâ€™s like my brother heâ€™s annoying. And youâ€™re youâ€ she smiled with a little shrug looking at him in an endearing manner. Dean couldnâ€™t help the way she made his heart flutter especially when she complimented him. â€œAre you sure you would want to do it with me?â€ He asked nervously a small smile on his lips as he moved closer to her.     Deans heart fluttered in his chest as the air outside suddenly felt more dense. They were sitting inches apart as she looked down at the ground picking at the grass. The idea of kissing her had crossed his mind many times but they were so young. Itâ€™s not like theyâ€™d actually go ahead with it right? Wrong.     He gulped looking up at her pouting itâ€™s not that he didnâ€™t want to it was just the fear of ruining what they already had. Meanwhile Y/N was trying not to giggle she had the worldâ€™s biggest crush on Dean and she doesnâ€™t even know what a crush is. All she knows is that heâ€™s her friend and she likes him. If you were to ask her who Dean is to her sheâ€™d say heâ€™s her friend whom she loves dearly as her own family.     â€œYeahâ€ Y/N found herself replying her voice barely above a whisper. Dean looked down at her his eyes widening slightly. â€œYeah?â€ He repeated in a higher pitched tone as if sheâ€™d change his mind. Then a grin pulled at both their lips lips â€œYeahâ€ She replied firmly sitting up a bit straighter. He couldnâ€™t believe he was agreeing to this they were children. And the fact theyâ€™re out in the open only made it feel even more taboo.     â€œOkayâ€ She replied softly her cheeks turning a shade of light pink. She leaned forward moving closer to him. â€œOkayâ€ Dean mimicked nodding his head slightly. They both chuckled nervously neither had ever done anything like it before. It wasnâ€™t like their parents would know theyâ€™d done it and they would only be their first and only kiss after all right?     Y/N smiled her heart rate picking up immensely as he confirmed with her â€œWaitâ€ She stopped pulling her head back. â€œBut donâ€™t tell daddy or uncle John. Promise?â€ She asked putting out her pinky finger. Dean intertwined his pinky finger with hers â€œI promiseâ€ he smiled back gulping slightly. Dean could feel his heart beat out of his chest it felt like a wave of heat took over his body as he leaned a little closer to her.     They were now sitting cross legged behind the scrapped car both nervous wrecks. His eyes looked down to her lips his own a small distance away. â€œWhat if one of them finds out?â€ He whispered in a shy shaky Ear tone. This seemed like a big deal for both of them considering they would be each otherâ€™s first kiss.     Her big (e/c) eyes looked up into his her cheeks now dusted in a warm tint of pink. â€œDonâ€™t worry they wonâ€™tâ€ she replied trying to keep her voice steady and confident but in reality she was the spitting image of nervousness.     â€œYeah youâ€™re rightâ€ he replied breathlessly with a nervous smile. He found himself looking down at her pretty pink lips then back up into her shining eyes which were staring intently into his. Y/N took the initiative and leaned in.      Dean swallowed hard as his eyes widened when he saw her inching closer to him he subconsciously parted his lips awaiting the feeling of her lips on his. His palms began to sweat and his head started to spin out of nerves.     Slowly he felt those soft lips make contact with his own. He couldnâ€™t move for a brief second but soon enough he eased into the kiss and closed his eyes. The peck didnâ€™t last long but it was enough to have them both swooning. Y/N was beet red when she pulled away having experienced her first kiss with none-other than Dean Winchester. â€œKids?! Breakfast is ready!â€ Bobby yelled from the house both of them froze.     â€œUh oh..â€ Dean whispered looking around. They were both still blushing the warmth between them almost felt electrifying. They quickly composed themselves pushing up from the ground to see Bobby standing on the back porch through the broken car window beckoning the children to come eat. â€œComing!â€ Dean yelled back grabbing Y/Nâ€™s shaky hand.     Her heart was still fluttering as they both made their way back into the house. They sat down at the table and looked at one another with flushed cheeks both knowing the secret sitting between them. But they knew it wasnâ€™t one that was gonna leave either of their mouths to another. They trusted each other and that trust would never break. Not in a million years.     â€œSo how was tag?â€ Sam chimed in innocently taking a bite of his bacon. The question snapped them back into reality and they quickly turned their heads to face Sam. â€œGood" Dean responded a little too fast with a nervous chuckle "Y-yeahâ€¦ it wasâ€¦it was goodâ€ Y/N said hesitantly shoving food into her mouth avoiding the older brothers gaze.     Bobby was too focused on eating his food but Sam noticed the difference almost immediately. He raised a questioning eyebrow and looked between the two children. â€œYou guys alright?â€ He asked with a mouthful of bacon. â€œSammy not eating with your mouth fullâ€ Bobby reprimanded him with a slight chuckle handing him a tissue.     â€œYeah yeah!â€ They both simultaneously replied a little too quickly. There was a beat of silence before Dean quickly thought of a new topic to change the subject â€œSo uh.. Sam did you see that new Godzilla movie yet?â€ He asked casually avoiding any eye contact.     Sam noticed this and couldnâ€™t help but think something seemed off. His eyes darted between the two friends noticing their flushed faces and how they were avoiding eye contact with one another completely. He could sense the tension between them like they were keeping something to themselves. He just couldnâ€™t put his finger on it.     Sam just shrugged it off digging into his eggs â€œYeah I did. It was pretty goodâ€ He said as he continued to eat his eyes flickered back up to the pair. He couldnâ€™t help feeling a bit suspicious. Something was definitely going on between them. He could tell by the way they were avoiding eye contact and their flushed cheeks.     Dean tried to hide his nervous expression but Sam could see through it. Sam with y/n they knew his brother and best friend like the back of his hand since he could talk. Sam made a mental note to keep an eye on them.     ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹  ________________________________        Authors Note: Another reminder they are KIDS. Nothing is bad about them having a harmless innocent peck. With that said any hate I will block and delete you. I donâ€™t hate rude comments kindly. Otherwise I hope you liked it! Iâ€™m thinking to do another one before weekend let me know if youâ€™re up for itâ¤ï¸  Taglist: @hjgdhghoe @rach5ive @tiggytaylor @star-yawnznn @quarterhorse19   @deangirl96 @bitchykittenconnoisseur @globetrotter28 @swimmingmakerathletedreamer @mrsjjkwinchester   @juwu-theliciosa   And yessss they were each others first kiss lmao.

Y/N is 7 years old Sam is 7 years old Dean is 11 years old.     BASED ON:     The Old Testament Series.     Genesis Primis: A Supernatural Rewrite (Dean Winchester x Reader) by @dianawinchester03      (Remember that they are KIDS itâ€™s just a harmless innocent peck)     ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹     <!-- more -->   â€œNo way!â€ Y/N exclaimed in surprise her palms pressed to her cheeks. â€œYes way! Sally-Ray told me!â€ Sam giggled mischievously â€œBut Daddy told me they were nasty and boys carried themâ€ Y/N laughed. â€œNuh-uhâ€ Sam shook his head â€œBut how are you so sureâ€¦â€ Y/N narrowed her eyes at Sam his cheeks flushed pink. Then realization dawned on her      â€œYOU DIDNT!â€ She pushed him slightly earning a cheeky smile from Sam. â€œYou had your first kiss Sammyyyy. Luckkyyyâ€ Y/N cooed â€œWhatâ€™s going on in here?â€ Dean walked in through the front door to see Sam and Y/N gossiping on the couch Bobby was in the kitchen making breakfast for them while Dean was out playing in the yard.     â€œSammy just told me cooties arenâ€™t real!â€ Y/N giggled â€œYou snitch that was supposed to me a secretâ€ Sam gasped whispering to her. â€œIâ€™m sure he already knowsâ€ She whispered back both looking over to Dean who had a puzzled and dumbfounded look on his face. â€œH-heâ€™s lyingâ€ Dean stuttered walking in to rest his action figure down on the coffee table.     Y/N and her best friend shared a mischievous look â€œCharminggggâ€¦..tag youâ€™re it!â€ She shoved Dean lightly before running out into the yard Dean laughed loudly running behind his friend. â€œBe careful you little idjits! Or your daddies are gonna have my head if you get hurtâ€ Bobby called out from the kitchen waving his spatula an apron wrapped around his beer gut with one hand propped on his hip as he flipped the pancakes. Y/N ran past him through the back door.     â€œCome â€˜mere princess Iâ€™m not gonna hurt you!â€ Dean laughed chasing after her. Y/Nâ€™s little feet could only carry her so far. So Dean caught up to her tapping her on your shoulder â€œYouâ€™re it!â€ Dean giggled y/n smiled widely and Deans face dropped â€œOh no you donâ€™t!â€ He stuttered running away as she chased after him â€œCome onnn Dean I know cooties arenâ€™t real anymoreâ€ She chased after him Dean was heavy on his feet.      The breath in his lungs slowly diminished as tire took him over. He crouched behind one of the old scrap cars peering up slightly to make sure she wasnâ€™t around. He realized he was dead wrong when a little girl tackled him using the moves her daddy thought her â€œI caught you!â€ Y/N giggled â€œNot fair! Youâ€™re not supposed to tackle in tagâ€ Dean defended as he got up from the ground dusting himself off.     â€œSnooze you lose charmingâ€ She smiled widely outstretching her hand for Dean to help her up. Dean took her hand without hesitation only to be pulled to the floor again. â€œOof!â€ Dean exclaimed with a laugh as he hit the floor with a thud. â€œ0-2â€ Y/N teased. â€œSeriously princess not fair!â€ Dean exclaimed crossing his arms with a pout. â€œAwww donâ€™t be a sour loserâ€ She reached over to pat his head.     Both still sprawled out on the ground â€œHey Dean? Is it true? Are cooties really not real?â€ Y/N asked curiously as they both pushed themselves up dusting their hands. â€œI donâ€™t knowâ€ Dean mumbled shrugging. â€œI havenâ€™t kissed anyoneâ€ His head dropped in a bit of shame â€œItâ€™s okay I havenâ€™t eitherâ€ Y/N assured her friend and then an idea crossed her mind.     â€œHey why donâ€™t we do it??â€ She smiled brightly the innocence protruding off of her. Deans jaw dropped gulping slightly â€œW-what?â€ His eyes widen â€œYou know? We are friends and I trust you. I wouldnâ€™t want it to be with anyone elseâ€¦unless you want it to be someone elseâ€ She pouted a bit not feeling stupid for suggesting it. â€œNo no. Itâ€™s not thatâ€¦I just thought you and Sam liked each otherâ€ Dean pulled his knees to his chest.     â€œNo! Ew no wayâ€ Y/N exclaimed with a light laugh â€œSamâ€™s like my brother heâ€™s annoying. And youâ€™re youâ€ she smiled with a little shrug looking at him in an endearing manner. Dean couldnâ€™t help the way she made his heart flutter especially when she complimented him. â€œAre you sure you would want to do it with me?â€ He asked nervously a small smile on his lips as he moved closer to her.     Deans heart fluttered in his chest as the air outside suddenly felt more dense. They were sitting inches apart as she looked down at the ground picking at the grass. The idea of kissing her had crossed his mind many times but they were so young. Itâ€™s not like theyâ€™d actually go ahead with it right? Wrong.     He gulped looking up at her pouting itâ€™s not that he didnâ€™t want to it was just the fear of ruining what they already had. Meanwhile Y/N was trying not to giggle she had the worldâ€™s biggest crush on Dean and she doesnâ€™t even know what a crush is. All she knows is that heâ€™s her friend and she likes him. If you were to ask her who Dean is to her sheâ€™d say heâ€™s her friend whom she loves dearly as her own family.     â€œYeahâ€ Y/N found herself replying her voice barely above a whisper. Dean looked down at her his eyes widening slightly. â€œYeah?â€ He repeated in a higher pitched tone as if sheâ€™d change his mind. Then a grin pulled at both their lips lips â€œYeahâ€ She replied firmly sitting up a bit straighter. He couldnâ€™t believe he was agreeing to this they were children. And the fact theyâ€™re out in the open only made it feel even more taboo.     â€œOkayâ€ She replied softly her cheeks turning a shade of light pink. She leaned forward moving closer to him. â€œOkayâ€ Dean mimicked nodding his head slightly. They both chuckled nervously neither had ever done anything like it before. Promise?â€ She asked putting out her pinky finger. Dean intertwined his pinky finger with hers â€œI promiseâ€ he smiled back gulping slightly. Dean could feel his heart beat out of his chest it felt like a wave of heat took over his body as he leaned a little closer to her. His eyes looked down to her lips his own a small distance away. â€œWhat if one of them finds out?â€ He whispered in a shy shaky Ear tone. This seemed like a big deal for both of them considering they would be each otherâ€™s first kiss.     Her big (e/c) eyes looked up into his her cheeks now dusted in a warm tint of pink. â€œDonâ€™t worry they wonâ€™tâ€ she replied trying to keep her voice steady and confident but in reality she was the spitting image of nervousness.     â€œYeah youâ€™re rightâ€ he replied breathlessly with a nervous smile. He found himself looking down at her pretty pink lips then back up into her shining eyes which were staring intently into his. Y/N took the initiative and leaned in.      Dean swallowed hard as his eyes widened when he saw her inching closer to him he subconsciously parted his lips awaiting the feeling of her lips on his. His palms began to sweat and his head started to spin out of nerves.     Slowly he felt those soft lips make contact with his own. He couldnâ€™t move for a brief second but soon enough he eased into the kiss and closed his eyes. The peck didnâ€™t last long but it was enough to have them both swooning. Y/N was beet red when she pulled away having experienced her first kiss with none-other than Dean Winchester. â€œKids?! Breakfast is ready!â€ Bobby yelled from the house both of them froze.     â€œUh oh..â€ Dean whispered looking around. They were both still blushing the warmth between them almost felt electrifying. They quickly composed themselves pushing up from the ground to see Bobby standing on the back porch through the broken car window beckoning the children to come eat. â€œComing!â€ Dean yelled back grabbing Y/Nâ€™s shaky hand.     Her heart was still fluttering as they both made their way back into the house. They sat down at the table and looked at one another with flushed cheeks both knowing the secret sitting between them. But they knew it wasnâ€™t one that was gonna leave either of their mouths to another. They trusted each other and that trust would never break. Not in a million years.     â€œSo how was tag?â€ Sam chimed in innocently taking a bite of his bacon. The question snapped them back into reality and they quickly turned their heads to face Sam. â€œGood" Dean responded a little too fast with a nervous chuckle "Y-yeahâ€¦ it wasâ€¦it was goodâ€ Y/N said hesitantly shoving food into her mouth avoiding the older brothers gaze.     Bobby was too focused on eating his food but Sam noticed the difference almost immediately. He raised a questioning eyebrow and looked between the two children. â€œYou guys alright?â€ He asked with a mouthful of bacon. â€œSammy not eating with your mouth fullâ€ Bobby reprimanded him with a slight chuckle handing him a tissue.     â€œYeah yeah!â€ They both simultaneously replied a little too quickly. There was a beat of silence before Dean quickly thought of a new topic to change the subject â€œSo uh.. Sam did you see that new Godzilla movie yet?â€ He asked casually avoiding any eye contact.     Sam noticed this and couldnâ€™t help but think something seemed off. His eyes darted between the two friends noticing their flushed faces and how they were avoiding eye contact with one another completely. He could sense the tension between them like they were keeping something to themselves. He just couldnâ€™t put his finger on it.     Sam just shrugged it off digging into his eggs â€œYeah I did. It was pretty goodâ€ He said as he continued to eat his eyes flickered back up to the pair. He couldnâ€™t help feeling a bit suspicious. Something was definitely going on between them. He could tell by the way they were avoiding eye contact and their flushed cheeks.     Dean tried to hide his nervous expression but Sam could see through it. Sam with y/n they knew his brother and best friend like the back of his hand since he could talk. Sam made a mental note to keep an eye on them.     ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹  ________________________________        Authors Note: Another reminder they are KIDS. On their wedding night Castiel decides to recount the story of how he pulled Dean from hell and how he fell in love with the righteous man he was destined to save.  â€œYou remember my first words to you in the barn?â€ Castiel asked arms around Dean as he lay resting on him. They had just made love for the first time after their wedding an affair so small that they only had the priest for the service and Sam as a witness. He made scarce not long after knowing from their looks that Cas and Dean wanted to go to the nice hotel they booked and consummate their marriage.  Not that they hadnâ€™t been consummating their relationship for a long time.  Fatigue was pulling at his mind as he rested his head on the warm man behind him. He wanted nothing more than to sleep but his curiosity was now piqued. Keen to see where Cas was going with this. He turned his neck cheek resting on his husbands pec so he could get a better look at him. Cas chuckled at the look of confusion clouding those gorgeous green eyes. He leant down tenderly taking his husbands lips in his own. Smiling when they broke apart moments later.  â€œThe first time we met?â€ Dean replied unconsciously grabbing Castielâ€™s left hand pulling it in front of him and placing gentle kisses on his knuckles before pulling away and examining the ring finger. Where there now lay a simple but elegant white gold ring. He couldnâ€™t believe after 12 long years and after almost losing one another forever when Cas was taken by the empty that they had made the commitment to love each other for the rest of their lives. Dean kissed his hand tenderly again before draping it around his chest until it rested on his shoulder. Sagging even further into the grip of his husband.  This was the happiest he had ever been in his life.  â€œYes the first time we met. In the barn after I saved you from hell.â€ He was shifting from underneath him now manoeuvring them so they were laying side by side facing one another. Cas clasped Deans ring hand and pulled it to his heart enjoying the feeling of the slightly warm gold against his chest. A broad smile adorned his face recounting the memory in his mind as if it was a happy one.  When Dean looked back at that time all he could remember was the fear as he was faced with this unknown entity claiming to be an Angel of the Lord. An entity that could turn the eyes of a human into liquid with just one look; that could make somebodies ears bleed just by trying to talk to them. An entity that would bring his wings out as a show of intimidation behind him. Fear at being told his raising from the pit had been a command from God himself.   He had to admit though that little confused head tilt was the most adorable thing heâ€™d ever seen.  â€œWhat about them my sweetheart?â€ With their new position he could now run his hands softly up his husbands sides enjoying the small whines he was eliciting from his loves lips. Before Cas answered he leant down and kissed Dean tenderly.  â€œDid I ever tell you how I gripped you tight and raised you from perdition?â€ Those words still had an effect on Dean that made him shiver. They rarely spoke about his time in hell or how Cas saved him. For years he was plagued by nightmares of his tenure there. How he went from tortured to torturer slicing pieces of souls for his tormentors for Alastair the demon that took him under his wing. As time passed the nightmares faded but he still didnâ€™t want to discuss what he did how his actions were the start of the apocalypse. When he and Cas begun a relationship some of the nightmares returned. His brain associating his lover with that traumatic moment in his life. When he awoke from them screaming Cas held him close murmured words of love and comfort until he would fall back asleep. His patience and love got him through and thatâ€™s why he knew he would get through this conversation. Castiel smiled softly bringing his arms around Deans waist running his hand up his lower back softly to indicate it would be okay.  â€œWhen I found you in hell I expected to find you on the torture racks. It shocked me to see you had submit to Alastair and had now become the torturer.â€ Dean hid his face in shame at the words only lifting his eyes when Cas pulled his chin up. They had never broached this subject before and Dean feared how his husband would see him. But those beautiful blue eyes showed nothing but understanding and love. He swallowed his shame down when Cas bought his hand up to cup his cheek. Smiling to show him that they could get through this. Everything would be okay.  He believed him.  â€œI remember approaching your soul. Angel blade in hand ready to fight any demon that stood in my way. But none did they submitted. A surprising turn of events considering how many of my brethren I lost on the way to finding you.â€ There was a small look of grief on his face. Wanting to comfort him Dean moved forward and pressed a soft kiss to those lips he loved so much. Reaching up and lacing his fingers around the hand still laying on his cheek. He nodded a silent indication Cas should continue. â€œWhen I got to you. I saw a haunted man who had been broken. One who had picked up the knife in a bid to stop their own pain. You claimed you enjoyed hurting other souls but nothing in your eyes suggested that to me at the time. Those green eyes still spoke of hope. They were a light in that terrible darkness.â€   Unconsciously Dean had drifted closer to Cas now resting his head on his chest as he listened to his husbands words. He let out a shaky breath waiting for Cas to continue.  â€œAlastair was there by your side with that twisted smile on his face. As I stood pleading with you to come with me he laughed and goaded me. You told me you didnâ€™t deserve to be saved you were at home in hell and these were your kind now. I was resolute though I was not leaving without you. Not when I had come so far and lost so much in my mission to save you.  â€œThere was a shift when Alastair realised I wasnâ€™t going to leave empty handed. The demons who had stood by and let me through now advanced on me. There were too many for me to take down at once. I managed to â€˜gankâ€™ a few as you would say.â€ Dean snorted with laughter imagining his husbands dorky little air quotes as he said the word gank causing Cas to grin a little before continuing his story.  â€œI knew if I didnâ€™t take action I would be lost in the depths of hell an unsatisfactory place for an Angel. I grabbed your wrist but you wrenched away from my grasp hissing in pain and demanding I leave as you didnâ€™t deserve to be saved.  â€œLost and out of ideas I got close enough. Pulling your back to my chest running my arm over just below your neck and gripping your left shoulder in my hand.â€ As he recounted the way he held him in hell Cas started to mirror it in real life. Turning his husband so his back was nestled against his chest his arm across his body. When he placed his hand over the left shoulder Dean gasped. It was psychological he was sure but when Cas touched him there an incredible pleasure would shoot up his body. Like a spark of electricity. He felt feather light kisses against his neck and shoulder causing him to groan softly and move to give Cas more room.  â€œAs I held you close your soul reached out to my grace. It was as if we were a perfect balance of one another yin and yang. It was that moment I wanted you all to myself Dean. I didnâ€™t care if you had a higher purpose as Michaels vessel I just wanted to claim you as my own. I had never felt so complete with another being.â€ He growled biting down a little on Deans neck causing the ex-hunter to moan in delight. He loved when Cas became all possessive.  â€œI clutched you tight to my chest and flew you out of the pit. Leaving behind the screams of Alastair and his demon flock. But that hand print my one of claim I couldnâ€™t bare to heal it at that moment. I needed those in heaven on earth and in hell to know that you Dean Winchester were mine and mine alone. And today I finally made good on that promise.â€ There was a snarl in his voice as he bent down and nipped at Deans neck again causing him to gasp eyes fluttering shut enjoying the sensation of his husband running his lips down his neck and shoulder. He felt a hand dance down his abs towards his interested member not caring they had finished making love less than an hour ago.  â€œI have loved you from that moment in hell when I wrapped you in my arms and I will love you for the rest of eternity. On Earth; and in heaven.â€ Emotions had gotten the better of Dean small tears started to fall down his cheeks. He laughed slightly before wiping them away turning his head again once he had.  â€œI am always thankful youâ€™re the one who saved me. I will love you for eternity to my Angel.â€ He whispered before they kissed passionately knowing this kiss was only going one way. All thoughts of fatigue had been wiped from Deans mind wanting to feel connected to his Angel in every way possible.  After that confession they made love multiple times throughout the night. In between kissing and touching one another unable to be apart for too long.  It wasnâ€™t until the next morning Dean thought through those words again and confessed the secret he had been holding for 12 years.  When he looked into Casâ€™s eyes for the first time whilst being raised in that moment he realised he had already fallen in love with him.  He had always loved his Angel and he would for all eternity.

I sighed and moved closer. â€œOkay before our date really gets going letâ€™s clear the air. No more doubts about me. Tell me what youâ€™ve heard and Iâ€™ll tell you if itâ€™s true. Whether you believe it or not is up to you.â€  He nodded turning to face me. After a moment of thought he spoke up. â€œOne thing I heard was that you used him and then left but I already know thatâ€™s not true.â€  â€œHow do you know thatâ€™s not true?â€  â€œBecause I was at that motel that day. I saw what he was doing and the look on his face. Also if you had used him and taken his money you wouldnâ€™t have come in without a tow truck that day.â€  I smiled and nodded. â€œGood detective work. What else?â€  He sighed and handed me the bottle. â€œThat you have a drinking problem and get violent when youâ€™re under the influence.â€  â€œOkay. I donâ€™t have a drinking problem. Andrew did. We went to parties had a few drinks and when I stood up to him because of the liquid courage he blamed it on that. Also I only hit him onceâ€”the day at the motel. That part was true.â€  He nodded his hand returning to my leg in a comforting gesture.  â€œWhat else?â€ I asked handing him back the bottle. He took a swig and looked down.  â€œI heard that the bruises on your face were from a bar fight and you blamed him for it. But again I know thatâ€™s not true.â€ He laughed.  I sighed and nodded. â€œI was in a bar fight technically. I was drinking with my neighbor and this random girl thought she was hitting on her boyfriendâ€”she actually wasâ€”so the girl got in her face. I stepped in and the girl swung at me. But after that I went home. My neighbor apparently told her husband I was the one hitting on the guy from the bar and he told Andrew. When I got home Andrew was furious and drunk. I tried to walk away but heâ€¦â€  I froze tears welling up as I recalled the painful memory. â€œHe grabbed me and threw me to the ground. That was the first time he hit me.â€  Dean winced his jaw tightening. â€œIs that when you left?â€  I shook my head tears streaming down my face. â€œNo. I was stupid and stayed. About a week later I found out he was sleeping with the neighbor. I confronted him angry and hurt. He called me a liar said I was drunk and imagining things. So I got even angrier threatened to leave and told him Iâ€™d expose him for who he really was. Thatâ€™s when he snappedâ€¦ I donâ€™t remember much after thatâ€”it happened so fastâ€”but I remember the pain of his fists over and over again. I remember seeing the blood on his hands and the smile on his face. I thought â€˜Iâ€™m going to die tonight. My fiancÃ© is going to kill me.â€™ And honestly at that moment I was okay with it. The pain he caused me was unbearable.â€  My head hung low as I sobbed quietly the weight of the memories crushing me. Dean pulled me onto his lap wrapping his arms around me protectively. â€œItâ€™s okay. Heâ€™s not going to hurt you anymore. I wonâ€™t let himâ€ he whispered soothingly.  I sighed and looked up Deanâ€™s thumbs gently wiping away my tears.  â€œIâ€™m sorryâ€ I choked out.  His brow furrowed in confusion. â€œSorry for what sweetheart?â€  â€œFor ruining our date. I shouldnâ€™t have talked about that.â€  He shook his head holding me tighter. â€œDonâ€™t apologize. You didnâ€™t ruin anything. In fact youâ€™ve made me feel even closer to you. I appreciate you telling me. It couldnâ€™t have been easy.â€  I shook my head resting against his shoulder my arms holding him close. A weight lifted off my shouldersâ€”I wasnâ€™t alone in this anymore. Someone finally believed me.  He kissed my forehead and smiled softly. â€œNow letâ€™s sit down and talk some more. Weâ€™ll still have a great night okay?â€  I nodded leaning in slowly to press my lips against his. Each kiss felt like the first and with each one I felt myself falling even deeper in love.  It was only our first date but I knewâ€”I was falling hard.  Thank you for reading I hope you enjoyed it! Chapter 4 coming soon stay tuned!  Like comment and reblog feedback is my fuel ğŸ’•

youâ€™re laughing??? he lost his shoe and youâ€™re laughing???

Thereâ€™s just something about the show supernatural that continues to draw me to it. Sure it doesnâ€™t have the best plot most of the seasons. The episodes are kind of repetitive. There are several other tv shows that are so much more fast paced thrilling and fun when compared to supernatural.   But I find myself coming back to it every single time. Countless rewatches. Convention videos. Itâ€™s a loophole. I watch a show obsess over it a short while then kinda let it go. But with spn itâ€™s become my comfort series. Helped me get over a situationship breakup. Never failed to make me laugh. Whenever I come back here Iâ€™m in it deep for a month at least as I rewatch scenes bloopers read fanfiction watch edits and con clips. A loophole I love.   I guess essentially itâ€™s the characters I love so much. So unique so normal yet so attractive and warm itâ€™s like I feel right watching the brothers hunt kill argue drive shoot hug and then and there I forget the world around me it doesnâ€™t matter Iâ€™ll just watch another episode with a broment. Itâ€™s stupid but I donâ€™t feel alone when Iâ€™m deep in the fandom. Maybe itâ€™s the distraction itâ€™s providing that helps me so much.   Or it could be the actors who played Sam and Dean who evidently very deeply care for their fans the show and the characters. Their friendship is something beautifully real so much that it restores hope in my heart. Their raw funny selves the endless cons they make sure not to miss even though the show ended long ago the way they portrayed the brothers to unreal perfection. Like no one couldâ€™ve been better.   I donâ€™t know what is it about this stupid show that doesnâ€™t let me go. No matter how great of an award winning show I watch Iâ€™ll always come back to supernatural.

Sam Girls United i love how we as Sam Girls from different countries race background ethnicities watch Supernatural and invariably agree on these thingsâ€¦  His Carhartt jacket is just as iconic as Deanâ€™s leather jacket and we miss it. Samâ€™s anger towards John is completely valid as someone who believed in questioning everything instead of blindly following orders. It wasnâ€™t selfish of Sam to ask for the last of lucky charms. Plus he really didnâ€™t eat it. He plucked out the toy from the packet and offered it to him. Sam was a lonely kid and this has nothing to do with Dean. He grew up believing he was a freak and unclean. He didnâ€™t have closer bonds outside of Dean and it fucks us up. Sam didnâ€™t start the apocalypse. It was a result of combined efforts of angels demons and unknowingly Dean but Sam ended up being the fall guy. Loss of bodily autonomy!!!! Soulless Sam was nobodyâ€™s fault but Castielâ€™s. Soulless Sam was hot and we stand by him. Just because Sam hit a dog and didnâ€™t look for Dean doesnâ€™t mean he does not care about his brother.  Dean tricking Sam into letting Gadreel possess him was a worse betrayal than Sam not looking for Dean when he was in purgatory. We are suckers for Sam Whump/hurt Sam because we love how pretty he looks when he is hurt! Majority of us donâ€™t like sabriel or sastiel. Demon Dean not feeding Sam his blood was a missed opportunity!! Sam is BAMF and you canâ€™t tell us otherwise! Bonus: Jaredâ€™s eyes are sunflowers and he is a freakin ray of sunshine

I love how this show tried to come across as lightly homophobic but absolutely failed and made itself seem even more gay. Then they finally embrace the homoeroticness and let the show be the gay fever dream we all know and love.

post_body: Today Dean uses some previously thrifted technology to make Cas a custom mixtape. He sketches out a track list before hesitating on the title. He thinks that it might come off a little strange to spontaneously gift a friend a painstakingly custom mixtape full of suspiciously romantic songs that just so happen to perfectly encapsulate his feeling for said friend. That being said he decides to title it â€œCasâ€™s Music Educationâ€ hoping the guise of getting the angel into his music will overshadow the true nature of the gift.

post_body: As I seem to be on the theme of when Cas and Dean fell in love.  Story - Did I ever tell you how I gripped you tight and raised you from perdition? Pairing - Castiel/Dean Winchester  Rating - Mature  Word Count - 1867  Summary - After they save Cas from the empty he and Dean start a relationship. On their wedding night Castiel decides to recount the story of how he pulled Dean from hell and how he fell in love with the righteous man he was destined to save.  â€œYou remember my first words to you in the barn?â€ Castiel asked arms around Dean as he lay resting on him. They had just made love for the first time after their wedding an affair so small that they only had the priest for the service and Sam as a witness. He made scarce not long after knowing from their looks that Cas and Dean wanted to go to the nice hotel they booked and consummate their marriage.  Not that they hadnâ€™t been consummating their relationship for a long time.  Fatigue was pulling at his mind as he rested his head on the warm man behind him. He wanted nothing more than to sleep but his curiosity was now piqued. Keen to see where Cas was going with this. He turned his neck cheek resting on his husbands pec so he could get a better look at him. Cas chuckled at the look of confusion clouding those gorgeous green eyes. He leant down tenderly taking his husbands lips in his own. Smiling when they broke apart moments later.  â€œThe first time we met?â€ Dean replied unconsciously grabbing Castielâ€™s left hand pulling it in front of him and placing gentle kisses on his knuckles before pulling away and examining the ring finger. Where there now lay a simple but elegant white gold ring. He couldnâ€™t believe after 12 long years and after almost losing one another forever when Cas was taken by the empty that they had made the commitment to love each other for the rest of their lives. Dean kissed his hand tenderly again before draping it around his chest until it rested on his shoulder. Sagging even further into the grip of his husband.  This was the happiest he had ever been in his life.  â€œYes the first time we met. In the barn after I saved you from hell.â€ He was shifting from underneath him now manoeuvring them so they were laying side by side facing one another. Cas clasped Deans ring hand and pulled it to his heart enjoying the feeling of the slightly warm gold against his chest. A broad smile adorned his face recounting the memory in his mind as if it was a happy one.  When Dean looked back at that time all he could remember was the fear as he was faced with this unknown entity claiming to be an Angel of the Lord. An entity that could turn the eyes of a human into liquid with just one look; that could make somebodies ears bleed just by trying to talk to them. An entity that would bring his wings out as a show of intimidation behind him. Fear at being told his raising from the pit had been a command from God himself.   He had to admit though that little confused head tilt was the most adorable thing heâ€™d ever seen.  â€œWhat about them my sweetheart?â€ With their new position he could now run his hands softly up his husbands sides enjoying the small whines he was eliciting from his loves lips. Before Cas answered he leant down and kissed Dean tenderly.  â€œDid I ever tell you how I gripped you tight and raised you from perdition?â€ Those words still had an effect on Dean that made him shiver. They rarely spoke about his time in hell or how Cas saved him. For years he was plagued by nightmares of his tenure there. How he went from tortured to torturer slicing pieces of souls for his tormentors for Alastair the demon that took him under his wing. As time passed the nightmares faded but he still didnâ€™t want to discuss what he did how his actions were the start of the apocalypse. When he and Cas begun a relationship some of the nightmares returned. His brain associating his lover with that traumatic moment in his life. When he awoke from them screaming Cas held him close murmured words of love and comfort until he would fall back asleep. His patience and love got him through and thatâ€™s why he knew he would get through this conversation.  He shook his head bringing his hand up to his left shoulder lamenting the loss of the handprint a mark of claim from the man he loved. Castiel smiled softly bringing his arms around Deans waist running his hand up his lower back softly to indicate it would be okay.  â€œWhen I found you in hell I expected to find you on the torture racks. It shocked me to see you had submit to Alastair and had now become the torturer.â€ Dean hid his face in shame at the words only lifting his eyes when Cas pulled his chin up. They had never broached this subject before and Dean feared how his husband would see him. But those beautiful blue eyes showed nothing but understanding and love. He swallowed his shame down when Cas bought his hand up to cup his cheek. Smiling to show him that they could get through this. Everything would be okay.  He believed him.  â€œI remember approaching your soul. Angel blade in hand ready to fight any demon that stood in my way. But none did they submitted. A surprising turn of events considering how many of my brethren I lost on the way to finding you.â€ There was a small look of grief on his face. Wanting to comfort him Dean moved forward and pressed a soft kiss to those lips he loved so much. Reaching up and lacing his fingers around the hand still laying on his cheek. He nodded a silent indication Cas should continue. â€œWhen I got to you. I saw a haunted man who had been broken. One who had picked up the knife in a bid to stop their own pain. You claimed you enjoyed hurting other souls but nothing in your eyes suggested that to me at the time. Those green eyes still spoke of hope. They were a light in that terrible darkness.â€   Unconsciously Dean had drifted closer to Cas now resting his head on his chest as he listened to his husbands words. He let out a shaky breath waiting for Cas to continue.  â€œAlastair was there by your side with that twisted smile on his face. As I stood pleading with you to come with me he laughed and goaded me. You told me you didnâ€™t deserve to be saved you were at home in hell and these were your kind now. I was resolute though I was not leaving without you. Not when I had come so far and lost so much in my mission to save you.  â€œThere was a shift when Alastair realised I wasnâ€™t going to leave empty handed. The demons who had stood by and let me through now advanced on me. There were too many for me to take down at once. I managed to â€˜gankâ€™ a few as you would say.â€ Dean snorted with laughter imagining his husbands dorky little air quotes as he said the word gank causing Cas to grin a little before continuing his story.  â€œI knew if I didnâ€™t take action I would be lost in the depths of hell an unsatisfactory place for an Angel. I grabbed your wrist but you wrenched away from my grasp hissing in pain and demanding I leave as you didnâ€™t deserve to be saved.  â€œLost and out of ideas I got close enough. Pulling your back to my chest running my arm over just below your neck and gripping your left shoulder in my hand.â€ As he recounted the way he held him in hell Cas started to mirror it in real life. Turning his husband so his back was nestled against his chest his arm across his body. When he placed his hand over the left shoulder Dean gasped. It was psychological he was sure but when Cas touched him there an incredible pleasure would shoot up his body. Like a spark of electricity. He felt feather light kisses against his neck and shoulder causing him to groan softly and move to give Cas more room.  â€œAs I held you close your soul reached out to my grace. It was as if we were a perfect balance of one another yin and yang. It was that moment I wanted you all to myself Dean. I didnâ€™t care if you had a higher purpose as Michaels vessel I just wanted to claim you as my own. I had never felt so complete with another being.â€ He growled biting down a little on Deans neck causing the ex-hunter to moan in delight. He loved when Cas became all possessive.  â€œI clutched you tight to my chest and flew you out of the pit. Leaving behind the screams of Alastair and his demon flock. During the ascent your head lulled back and you stared at me with those gorgeous green eyes with a look of awe and love.â€ Reflecting Casâ€™s words Deans head lulled back against his husbands shoulder who bought his free hand up to tenderly grab his chin. â€œThis look this is the moment I knew our bond was profound and you could feel it to.â€ He caressed Deans lips with his own briefly before finishing his story.  â€œOnce we got to Earth I repaired your damaged body and soul. But that hand print my one of claim I couldnâ€™t bare to heal it at that moment. I needed those in heaven on earth and in hell to know that you Dean Winchester were mine and mine alone. And today I finally made good on that promise.â€ There was a snarl in his voice as he bent down and nipped at Deans neck again causing him to gasp eyes fluttering shut enjoying the sensation of his husband running his lips down his neck and shoulder. He felt a hand dance down his abs towards his interested member not caring they had finished making love less than an hour ago.  â€œI have loved you from that moment in hell when I wrapped you in my arms and I will love you for the rest of eternity. On Earth; and in heaven.â€ Emotions had gotten the better of Dean small tears started to fall down his cheeks. He laughed slightly before wiping them away turning his head again once he had.  â€œI am always thankful youâ€™re the one who saved me. I will love you for eternity to my Angel.â€ He whispered before they kissed passionately knowing this kiss was only going one way. All thoughts of fatigue had been wiped from Deans mind wanting to feel connected to his Angel in every way possible.  After that confession they made love multiple times throughout the night. In between kissing and touching one another unable to be apart for too long.  It wasnâ€™t until the next morning Dean thought through those words again and confessed the secret he had been holding for 12 years.  When he looked into Casâ€™s eyes for the first time whilst being raised in that moment he realised he had already fallen in love with him.  He had always loved his Angel and he would for all eternity.
