post_body: Breaking Free: Chapter 6- Dangerous Reunion Pairings: AU! Mechanic Dean x Reader  Chapter Summary: After a heavy conversation with Dean and a request from John Y/N finds herself in trouble.  Warnings: This chapter contains panic domestic violence anxiety violence abusive relationshipinjuries read with caution.   Series Masterlist here!! & Main masterlist here!  <!-- more --> -Three Weeks Later-  I woke up to a strange weight on my stomach. Opening my eyes a smile naturally spread across my face as I glanced at Dean.   His arm was draped over me his head nestled against my neck in a peaceful slumber. Checking the time I frowned realizing he was running late for work.  Leaning closer I whispered â€œDean wake up.â€  He groaned softly snuggling closer. â€œGood morning sweetheart.â€  His deep sleepy voice melted me as I kissed his cheek. â€œYou need to get up your going to be late for work.â€  Dean smirked sighing â€œMy dadâ€™s the boss. He wonâ€™t fire me.â€  â€œBut he wonâ€™t be thrilled that on our first night living together you slept inâ€ I pointed out.  His smile faded a troubled look crossing his face as he stared at the ceiling. Sitting up I asked â€œYou havenâ€™t told him we moved in together?â€  Dean sat up taking my hand. â€œNo. Why bother? He doesnâ€™t support us.â€  I sighed worrying about Deanâ€™s relationship with his father. â€œDean I want you to have a good relationship with your dad.â€  â€œOur relationship is complicated Y/Nâ€ he admitted squeezing my hand. â€œIt has nothing to do with you or us.â€  Bullshit.â€œ I whispered.   I knew I was overreacting but the thought that I might be ruining lives weighed heavily on me. All I wanted was for Dean to feel loved especially since it was clear he wasnâ€™t getting that from his dad. Dean clearly looked up to him and I hated that my presence seemed to prevent him from feeling that pride.  "Was the fight in the office the first fight you had about me or was there another before?â€ I asked gently.  He sighed wiping his face. â€œBefore. The day I dropped off the car after the Andrew incident.â€  I sighed heavily and buried my head in my hands. â€œWhat was the fight about?â€  He sighed too drawing closer and taking my hand in his. â€œY/Nâ€¦ You really donâ€™t need to hear this. Itâ€™s only going to make you feel worse.â€  Shaking my head I met his gaze directly. â€œNo I need to know.â€  â€œOkayâ€¦â€ He hesitated before continuing. â€œIt was because Andrew was supposed to interview my dad but after the motel incident we lost the opportunity. My dad was furious that I got involved in the drama between you and Andrewâ€¦â€  I nodded slowly squeezing his hand in reassurance.   Then a memory flashed through my mind: our first date when I noticed a cut on his lip and a bruise on his cheek. He hadnâ€™t had those injuries before he dropped off the car.   Memories flooded backâ€”Deanâ€™s bruises on our first date. My heart raced. â€œDean those bruisesâ€¦ were they from your dad?â€  He swallowed hard his head bowing slightly. â€œYeah.â€  My heart shattered as panic rushed within me. He had been hurt because of me and that thought was unbearable especially after what happened with Andrew.  â€œNo noâ€¦ Sweetheart please breatheâ€ he urged gently.  Tears welled up in my eyes. â€œI-I canâ€™t believe I did this to youâ€¦â€  His expression fell pained. â€œYou did nothing to me sweetheart. It wasnâ€™t you. My dad and I have had our differences for a long time and itâ€™s not the first time things have turned physical.â€  I wanted to hear him to take in the words he was saying but all I could see was flashes from my past every time Andrew told me it was my fault this was happening now that Dean was the one getting hit I believed it. It was my fault.  â€œY-Yes but for him to hit youâ€¦ because of meâ€¦ I can'tâ€¦â€ I gasped for air feeling like my chest was tightening my ears ringing.   I collapsed to the floor and Dean quickly followed pulling me onto his lap. â€œWhoa wait no Y/N breathe!â€   I looked up into his eyes seeing concern and pity and I despised it. I hated feeling so reliant like such a burden.   His hand moved soothingly up and down my back his gaze locked onto mine as he took slow deep breaths silently urging me to follow suit. Without thinking I mirrored his breathing feeling the tension ease and the air flow back into my lungs.  He sighed with relief and then gently rested his chin on my head. â€œSweetheart I want you to know that it wasnâ€™t your fault. I wouldnâ€™t change a thing. Did I like that John hit me? No but itâ€™s not the first time and wonâ€™t be the last. It has nothing to do with you. Heâ€™s just a jerk when he doesnâ€™t get his way.â€  I nodded wiping my eyes. â€œI wish things were different for you. I wish he didnâ€™t hurt you.â€  Dean swallowed hard his face becoming serious as he composed himself. When I looked into his eyes I saw tears forming. â€œDean?â€  â€œThis is the first time Iâ€™ve really talked about Johnâ€¦ my dad hitting me. And itâ€™s the first time someone has cared enough to wish it was different. Usually people just tell me to toughen up and deal with it but they donâ€™t know about the hitting.â€  I held him tighter. â€œHowever you handle it youâ€™re still a man. Itâ€™s okay to be hurt by it. Itâ€™s okay to hate him for it. Itâ€™s okay to not be okay.â€  He nodded kissing my head gratefully. â€œThank you. Do you feel any better?â€  â€œA little. Iâ€™m sorry I freaked outâ€¦â€  He shook his head helping me to stand a reassuring smile on his face. â€œI understand sweetheart. Fists violence abuseâ€”itâ€™s a trigger. If itâ€™s happening to someone close to you it can cause panic. Donâ€™t apologizeâ€¦ and thank you again for what you said.â€  I kissed him gently and hugged him close. â€œNow you really should get ready before you get into trouble.â€  He winked heading to the bathroom to dress. It only took a few minutes for him to get ready and grab his lunch before kissing me goodbye and leaving.  Alone I sighed deeply. I did feel somewhat relieved but I couldnâ€™t shake the discomfort of how violence seemed to be a common response in our town. Where had communication and understanding gone? Where was the compassion?  The day dragged on slowly. I cleaned the entire apartment and searched for jobs without any success. I updated my resume and watched TV and it wasnâ€™t even evening yet. Dean wouldnâ€™t be off work for a few hours and I knew I had to do something before I went stir-crazy being alone here.  I quickly got dressed and headed to my car. I figured I might as well pick up dinner or do some shoppingâ€”anything to pass the time. Just as I was about to start the car my phone rang in the cup holder. I frowned at the unknown number flashing on the screen but I answered it anyway.  â€œHello?â€  The voice hesitated before speaking. â€œHello.. Is this Y/N?â€  I froze recognizing the voice and anxiety began to creep in. It was John.I tried to keep the shake out of my voice   â€œUm yeah itâ€™s me. Is this John?â€  â€œYeah. I was wondering if I could talk to you for a moment. Can we meet up?â€  â€œUh sure. Do you want me to come to the shop?â€  There was a brief silence making me even more nervous.  â€œNo Iâ€™d rather not involve Dean in this and you know how he gets when heâ€™s protective.â€  â€œGot itâ€¦ Okay how about the coffee place around the corner?â€  â€œSounds good. See you in about 10 minutes.â€  I hunt up the phone and took a deep breath wondering why John wanted to meet in person. Did Dean tell him we were living together? Was he going to confront me about something?  The uncertainty made me drive quickly spotting him already seated inside the coffee shop. I put on my best poker face and walked inside greeting him with a gentle smile. He returned the smile but I could tell he was a little uneasy about this meeting as he motioned for me to sit across him from in the booth.  As I sat down the air thickened with awkwardness and my nerves began to rise.  â€œSo I just wanted to apologize for how I spoke to you the first time we met. I hope you understood where I was coming fromâ€ John started.  I nodded. â€œYeah and Iâ€™m sorry I havenâ€™t left Dean. I couldnâ€™t.â€  He raised his hand reassuringly. â€œNo donâ€™t. Dean told me about you guys moving in together this morning and Iâ€™m happy for you guys. I donâ€™t get it but Iâ€™m happy. But I do have a huge favour to ask.â€  I nodded for him to continue my anxiety growing.  â€œAndrew has been ignoring my calls but I finally got through to him when I mentioned that you were dating Deanâ€ John explained.  My heart sank as fear gripped me.  â€œHe said heâ€™ll agree to do the interview the review the news segment but only if youâ€™re willing to talk to him. Just one conversation with him for closureâ€ John continued.  I froze. Why did Andrew want to talk to me? Did he actually want closure? Naturally I wanted to refuse to tell Andrew off. But here was Deanâ€™s father asking me for a favour. This could be my chance to prove Iâ€™m a good person.  â€œNow I know thatâ€™s a lot to ask butâ€”â€ John began but I cut him off.  â€œIâ€™ll do itâ€ I said firmly.  He looked surprised. â€œReally?â€  â€œYeah. Youâ€™re right itâ€™s good for your business and this drama between me and Andrew has nothing to do with you. If talking to him is the only way to clear things up and help you out then Iâ€™ll do it.â€  John stood up moved to my side of the booth and pulled me into an unexpected hug. I laughed and hugged him back. It felt good to be appreciated even though the thought of facing Andrew made my heart race.  After saying our goodbyes I left the diner and pulled out my phone dialing the familiar number that always made me cringe.  â€œHello Y/N.â€ Andrew spoke knowingly.  â€œHi Andrew. I just finished talking to John. Iâ€™ll talk to you if you give him the interview and the segment.â€ I replied firmly.  â€œOkay deal. Can you come by the house?â€ He questioned.  I hesitated â€œMaybe itâ€™s better somewhere in public..â€ He sighed and I could feel the frustration rising.   â€œY/N your stuff is still here. Come talk grab your stuff and you can go.â€  I hesitated for a moment. Being at his house with no witnesses wasnâ€™t a comforting thought. But John knew my where I was going. â€œOkay Iâ€™ll be there in 15.â€  I hung up and dialed Johnâ€™s number immediately. He picked up quickly.  â€œHello?â€ John answered.  â€œHey itâ€™s Y/N. Iâ€™m on my way to Andrewâ€™s. Um I hate to ask this but can you try calling me in about an hour? And if I donâ€™t answer can you come by the house? Or send help?â€ I requested urgently.  John sighed as he paused finally realizing maybe I wasnâ€™t making everything up after all. â€œYeah for sure. Iâ€™m sorry I asked you to do this.. and please donâ€™t tell Dean yet he will be pissed.â€  â€œDonâ€™t apologize. I understand I wonâ€™t tell Dean. Just please call me in an hourâ€ I pleaded.  â€œI willâ€ John assured me before we hung up.  I ended the call and started my car heading towards the familiar house that always filled me with anxiety.   I wasnâ€™t sure why Andrew had insisted on talking or why heâ€™d used John as a middleman but I knew I had to do this for him. For Dean. For myself. I needed to get closure to say goodbye to the pain of the past. To do something big for others and myself.  As I pulled up I stared at the house. It looked charming from the outside and no one would suspect the nightmares hidden behind those gray walls. But I knew. I knew the darkness that lived within.  The walk to the door felt endless each step heavy with fear. When I finally knocked time seemed to quicken.  Andrew greeted me with a smirk. â€œY/N come on in.â€  I managed a smile and entered glancing around at the unchanged surroundings. My clothes were still in a hamper as if time had stood still in this place. Did he even live here anymore?  Sitting down on the couch I waited for Andrew to join me. He sat across from me his expression unreadable. â€œHow have you been?â€ he finally asked.  â€œIâ€™ve been alrightâ€¦ How about you?â€  He smirked avoiding the question with an angry look. â€œSo I hear youâ€™re living with Dean now.â€  I nodded feeling the tension rise. â€œYeah for a few weeks.â€  He sighed a hint of frustration in his voice. â€œThis is getting ridiculous Y/N. You must know people are talking.â€  â€œTalking about what?â€  â€œAbout you leaving a news reporter for a mechanic. It doesnâ€™t reflect well on you or me for that fact.â€  I felt anger flare up inside me. â€œI donâ€™t care what people say. Iâ€™m happy.â€  He rolled his eyes. â€œAre you really? Happier than you were with us?â€  â€œAndrewâ€¦â€  â€œNo letâ€™s talk about this. Are you really happier now than when it was us? What did I do so wrong?â€ Andrewâ€™s voice was edged with disbelief.  I couldnâ€™t meet his eyes gripping my fists tightly. â€œYou hurt me.â€  He shook his head â€œYou know your not innocent here. You always pushed me. We fight is that enough to throw everything away?.â€  I stood up the anger boiling over. â€œYes! It was enough because you beat me until your fists were covered in my blood and then you made me believe it never happened. You made everyone think I was worthless and a liar and that it was my fault. Iâ€™m glad I left.â€  He scoffed advancing towards me. â€œI have much more at stake than you do Y/N. What do you have? A family that barely acknowledges you? No friends? A mechanic as a boyfriend? I moved here hoping to build a future with you. If you slander my name it could destroy my career. Do you not understand that?â€  I lowered my head as fear flowed through me at his distance â€œI understand but I havenâ€™t gone around spreading lies about you. Iâ€™ve only defended myself when others accused me. No offense Andrew but I donâ€™t care enough about you to ruin your career.â€  He rolled his eyes and sat down burying his head in his hands pretending to be upset. This was his tactic after every major argumentâ€”break down apologize beg for forgiveness make me believe it was my fault. But this time it wouldnâ€™t work.  â€œWhy did you want to talk to me?â€ I asked my voice steadier now.  â€œBecause I want you back. I want the rumours the fights the drama to stop. You and I have a history. Canâ€™t you just come back home?â€  I shook my head staring at the floor. â€œThis isnâ€™t my home. Dean is my home. You messed up. You hurt me. You tried to destroy my life. Iâ€™m not coming back.â€  He looked at me his expression hardening. â€œNever?â€  â€œNever.â€  He nodded standing up and wiping his hands on his pants. â€œFine. Your stuff is still upstairs. Letâ€™s go get it and Iâ€™ll help you load it into your car.â€  I nodded cautiously and followed Andrew upstairs to our old room. He moved with intentional slowness his behavior unsettling. Deep down I sensed danger but I was too overwhelmed to act on it.   Checking the time I realized John would call in about 15 minutes. I held onto the hope that I would be safe then.  But Andrewâ€™s anger was overflowing he was disgusted by the fact that I would choose Dean over him he couldnâ€™t understand what he did wrong or he didnâ€™t care.  Once we got into the bedroom he turned towards me a sinister grin on his face. â€œIâ€™ve changed my deal. Iâ€™ll do the segment and the interview only if you come home to me.â€  I froze as the anger bubbled â€œThat wasnâ€™t the deal. You said if I came to talk to you.â€  He smirked and rolled his eyes â€œYeah becuase I needed you to come here. Do we have a deal or not?â€  I didnâ€™t even hesitate there was no way this was happening. â€œAbsolutely not this is done.â€  Turning to walk away fear rose as I felt his hand gripping my arm tightly â€œOur conversation isnâ€™t fucking done do not walk away from me.â€  â€œAndrew let go of me!â€ I shouted horror filling my body as he pulled me closer hand closing around my throat squeezing the sides tightly.  I panicked and acted fast raising my knee to kick him before I rushed out of the bedroom as fast as my feet would take me.  I reached the top of the stairs when I felt a force push me from behind. Time seemed to slow as I tumbled down the stairs landing with a painful thud at the bottom.   Andrew stood at the top looking down at me with a cruel grin. I struggled to move feeling intense pain throughout my body. My legs were numb my head throbbed and the taste of blood filled my mouth. I feared I had broken my entire body.  My phone rang and I strained to reach it but Andrew was quicker. He descended the stairs snatching it away and covering my mouth to keep me quiet. He answered the call with a falsely calm attitude.  â€œHello John. Yeah everythingâ€™s fine. Y/N is just in the bathroom. Oh and tell Dean that Y/N decided to come back to me. Iâ€™ll definitely be doing your interview. Talk later bye.â€  Tears streamed down my face as Andrew ended the call. I rested my head back praying desperately that John wouldnâ€™t believe Andrewâ€™s lies that he would sense something was terribly wrong.   Please I pleaded silently please see through this. Please John save me.  Thank you for reading I hope you enjoyed it! Chapter 7 coming soon stay tuned!  Like comment and reblog feedback is my fuel ğŸ’•

ok this is a hot take: but you guys need to be nicer to John   He was doing his best  Sure not every decision was the best possible one. But we ALL make mistakes.   His entire life got flipped upside in one night   He lost EVERYTHING the night Mary died  He wanted to be there for the boys he really did. He wanted to keep them safe and as far away from the truth as he could for as long as possible. Unfortunately those two things conflict  Think about it; if your significant other or someone you care deeply about was ripped away from you and you knew the monster that took them from you was out there: would you not do everything in your power to bring them to justice?  But it wasnâ€™t just Mary he lost that night.   He lost the love of his life yes. But his entire world changed.   You all seem to forget that he wasnâ€™t a hunter. That night where he lost Mary was his first encounter with any sort of monster (that he would remember at least.)      I donâ€™t know about the rest of you but Iâ€™ve read both Johnâ€™s journal and Bobbyâ€™s guidebooks. So Iâ€™ve seen so many things that never made it into the show.   Iâ€™ve seen all the regret and the pain and the desperation that the boys never did     John was a mess after the fire. For the first few weeks he was almost never sober.   He had no idea what he was doing. Maryâ€™s journals had largely been destroyed so he had little to go off of.   Bobby got him on his feet at least  He felt so bad about everything the boys had to go through.  He felt terrible for all the responsibilities Dean took on   I canâ€™t tell what broke his heart more: hearing baby Sammy crying for his mother or realizing that he had stopped.      Everything that John did was for the boys  He wanted to kill that demon so they could have a normal life  He knew heâ€™d be living in constant fear until Azazel was dead and worse: that the boys his boys would be in danger.   And he couldnâ€™t have that.      Look Iâ€™m not saying he was perfect. Thereâ€™s a lot that never should have happened. But he doesnâ€™t deserve the hatred you all seem to have for him. He was just a desperate father trying to protect his kids.

post_body: Against Instincts Summary: Dean made a very serious mistake but much to his surprise Reader forgives him & the two share a special moment.  TW/CW: Abuse (by Readerâ€™s father) Mention of Dean hitting Reader Dean doubting himself Mentions of injuries (bruises welt etc.) Angst Angst Angst Dean Winchester x Reader  Requested?: No  Word Count: 1979  A/N: Idek where this came from. It sorta spawned from me wishing Dean could show up & rescue me from my dog shit life (Iâ€™m not being abused I just have a lot of bullshit going on with my parents) & also just me feeling angsty as fuck. Anyway I hope you enjoy the read. REQUESTS ARE OPEN! Much love to all!  (Y/N)â€™s POV     John Winchester was a hard ass at times but he was never cruel. I think thatâ€™s why when his teenage son Dean returned from what was supposed to be a quick grocery store run with myself around the same age in tow claiming â€œHer dad is a monster. We have to help herâ€ he couldnâ€™t just ignore me & send me on my way. He visibly stowed his anger at Deanâ€™s tardiness & observed me. Iâ€™m sure he took note of the bruises scattered across the little bit of skin I had visible some were old some were new. He probably noticed the split lip paired with a blossoming black eye. Yet he ushered me into the car with orders for Sam & Dean to stay put.     When he pulled into my driveway my face felt warn with embarrassment. From the outside my house looked like no one had lived there in years. He walked me to the front door & knocked. When there was no response he knocked again.     I looked up at him â€œHeâ€™s probably asleep.â€ I opened the door & walked in. Inside the house was spotless. When I entered my father stirred on the couch & sat up.     He was very clearly drunk as he slurred his words â€œWhere the hell have you been girl?â€   <!-- more -->  I looked down at my shopping bags in my hands â€œI went out to get milk & bread.â€     My father rubbed his eyes still having not noticed John standing just outside the front door â€œAinâ€™t you got something to clean? Make yourself useful & get me beer first.â€     I hid my face from John as I shuffled over to the fridge & retrieved a beer as instructed. I walked over to the couch & handed it to him â€œWhat would you like me to clean?â€     He looked up at me furious â€œAre you dumb? You should be able to figure out how to clean by now.â€ Dean was right this man is a monster. I took a few steps back & looked around me for something to clean.     In the blink of an eye my father jumped up from the couch & grabbed my arm â€œGet your useless ass into the kitchen & wash those damn dishesâ€ he yelled before shoving me so hard toward the counter that I lost balance & hit the floor. John rushed over & offered his hand to me as my father lazily wandered over to the couch & plopped down. I gently took Johnâ€™s hand & was hauled to my feet.     Suddenly my father noticed Johnâ€™s presence â€œWho the hell are you?â€ John said nothing & simply pulled the me to the front door placing himself between me & my father who was still plastered on the couch. Before the door shut behind us I heard my father grumble â€œGood riddance. Sheâ€™s worthless anyway.â€ Tears rushed to my eyes but I fought them back as John pulled me toward the car. Once we were safely inside he sped back toward the motel.     There was never a missing personâ€™s report filed or police involvement. My father never bothered to look for me. People we encountered never questioned why I was with the Winchesters. It seemed everyone assumed I was their daughter & sister. Sure life on the road was never easy & sometimes John was hard on me but I would much rather stay with the Winchesters than to go back to my father. At some point I stopped only giving my first name when introducing myself & began introducing myself as (Y/N) Winchester. They were the closest thing I had ever had to a family.     I am pulled back to the present at the faint sound of voices outside my bedroom door. Theyâ€™re too quiet to make out what is being said but I roll over grabbing my headphones to play music to drown them out completely.   Deanâ€™s POV     â€œWhat are you doing?â€ Sam asks shaking me from my thoughts. I stay silent. â€œDean whatâ€™s wrong? Why are you sitting outside of (Y/N)â€™s door in the middle of the night?â€ I look down at my lap. â€œShe tried to get you to talk to her didnâ€™t she?â€ I nod. â€œWhatâ€™d you do? Yell at her?â€     I clench my jaw â€œAnd hit her.â€     Sam is taken aback â€œYou-â€ Itâ€™s quiet. â€œYou canâ€™t apologize to her if youâ€™re just sitting out here on your ass.â€     â€œSheâ€™s hasnâ€™t criedâ€ I mumble.     â€œHow do you know?â€ Sam asks.     â€œWhen she ran out of the room I realized what I did & followed her. By the time I made it to her door she had already shut it.â€     â€œSo you-â€     â€œIâ€™ve been sitting here trying to convince myself to knock & she hasnâ€™t cried at allâ€     â€œYou know when she doesnâ€™t cry sheâ€™s-â€     â€œI knowâ€ I grit my teeth â€œSheâ€™s angry.â€     â€œWell like I said you canâ€™t make it right sitting out here.â€     â€œNot long after she left her dad & hit the road with us I promised her that Iâ€™d never let anything happen to her. Iâ€™d always protect her.â€     â€œDean-â€     â€œI hit her Sam. Iâ€™m no better than that piece of shit that calls himself her father.â€     â€œDean donâ€™t. That man let a stranger walk out of his house with her. He didnâ€™t give two shits that he hurt her. He wouldnâ€™t be sitting outside her bedroom door nearly in tears trying to convince himself to apologize. Youâ€™re better than that guy. Youâ€™re her best friend & you need to talk to her.â€ I tossed Samâ€™s words around in my head for a few moments before he walked off saying â€œIf you do decide to get up & knock I might think about rescuing you when she beats the shit out of you.â€     â€œI deserve whatever she does to meâ€ I mumble to myself.   (Y/N)â€™s POV     After a few hours of listening to music my headphones beep that theyâ€™re dying. I pull them off & toss them toward the end of the bed making a mental note to charge them later. For a few moments all I can hear is the music still playing through my dying headphones. Then thereâ€™s a knock at the door. I hold my breath hoping theyâ€™ll go away. Iâ€™m sure itâ€™s Dean but Iâ€™m hoping itâ€™s Sam. If I face Dean right now I might kill him. Okay maybe not kill but definitely maim.     Another knock sounds. I begrudgingly toss the covers off of my legs & get up. As I pad over to the door the knocker speaks â€œ(Y/N) please let me in. I am so unbelievably sorry. I know I donâ€™t deserve it but please let me check on you.â€ Iâ€™m quiet mentally arguing with myself about whether I should open the door or not. â€œOkayâ€¦ I understand. Iâ€™ll leave you alone.â€     I rush to open the door. His head shoots up to look at me. The worry & fear on his face hurts my heart. I know Dean. I know him better than I know myself sometimes which is why I never expected the outburst from him that I got. I clench my jaw â€œIâ€™m fine.â€ Dean scans my face before breaking eye contact & looking down at his feet. I leave the door open & return to sit on the end of my bed. He stays put at the open door so I give him a look that says â€œWell come in.â€     He begins making his way to me â€œ(Y/N) I-â€ he drops to his knees in front of me & drops his head into his hands â€œIâ€™m so sorry. I donâ€™t know what came over me & I know thatâ€™s no excuse but please know I never wanted to hurt you I just got angry.â€ When he looks up again there is tears in his eyes. His voice cracks as he reaches up â€œCan I?â€     I nod. He gently runs the pad of his thumb over the welt & slowly forming bruise on my cheek. I notice his jaw clench as he pulls his hand away â€œLetâ€™s hear itâ€¦â€     I tilt my head at him with confusion on my face â€œHear what?â€     â€œHow you never want to see me again & Iâ€™m a piece of shit. Iâ€™m sure youâ€™re probably wanting to give me a couple good right hooks for what I didâ€ his voice is small & quiet as he continues â€œI deserve it.â€     I think for a moment â€œYouâ€™re right. I want to beat the shit out of you. The crazy & scary thing is Iâ€™d rather crawl into your lap & you hold me like we used to do when I would wake up screaming from a nightmare about my father. I want you to tell me everything is okay & that youâ€™re here & youâ€™ll keep me safe.â€ I let my words hang in the air for a second & it breaks my heart to see him break a little too. â€œButâ€¦ you hit me Deanâ€¦ Youâ€™re supposed to make sure no one ever hurts me but you hurt me. I want so badly to just brush it off & move on but I canâ€™t. Every instinct in my bones is screaming that I canâ€™t trust you.â€     He nods solemnly â€œI understand. Iâ€™ll leave you alone.â€     He stands to leave but I grab his arm â€œContrary to my usual belief my instincts arenâ€™t winning this time.â€ I tug him to sit beside me on the bed â€œDean youâ€™re the most important person in my life. Somedays youâ€™re all that keeps me goingâ€¦ I canâ€™t lose you not when I know that outburst is not who you are.â€ Heâ€™s quiet but a look of hope grows on his face. I continue â€œI forgive you.â€     A small smile graces his features â€œThank you. You donâ€™t know how much this means to me. I promise I will never hurt you again. I promise Iâ€™ll do better.â€ I nod & weâ€™re left in silence for a few moments before he speaks again â€œYou were trying to get me to tell you why Iâ€™ve been distant lately.â€ I nod he takes a deep breath â€œI-â€¦ Iâ€™ve been trying to distance myself from you becauseâ€¦ because I love you (Y/N). It terrifies me because I know you deserve better & I know you donâ€™t feel the same way so I was hoping distancing myself would make those feelings go away but if anything it made them worse & I was just super frustrated that it wasnâ€™t working so when you came to me asking whatâ€™s wrong I just exploded.â€ he pauses â€œIâ€™m sorry you got caught in the blast radius.â€     I take his hand in mine â€œIâ€™m gonna break this down piece by piece. First of all idk how on earth you think Iâ€™m gonna find anyone better than you. You always take care of me & keep me safe. You know me better than anyone. You understand me better than anyone. I wonâ€™t find that anywhere else. Second of all how dare you assume I donâ€™t feel the same wayâ€ I giggle â€œWhen did you become a mind reader? Thirdly why didnâ€™t you just tell me you needed space? I wouldâ€™ve understood. I didnâ€™t enjoy just being left in the cold by my best friend & the man I love.â€     He looks me in the eye â€œI donâ€™t deserve you ya know that?â€ I shrug. He chuckles â€œIâ€™m sorry I didnâ€™t just say something. Iâ€™ll add it to my list of things to be better about.â€     I squeeze his hand â€œWhile youâ€™re at it add stop doubting yourself to the list.â€ I place my free hand on his cheek â€œI wish you could see yourself the way I do.â€     He leans his forehead against mine â€œI love you (Y/N)â€     I smile â€œI love you too Dean.â€   More Dean Winchester  Masterlist

SPN Rareship Bingo Fill - Midam This is the second last fic to fill my SPN rareship bingo card (@spnrareships) and the prompt called for â€œAdamâ€. Who else could I pair Adam with except canon Michael?  Enjoy this short one-shot that shows how I imagine their love-story started in the very depths of hell.   Community label due to some references of what is happening in hell between Lucifer and Sam.   Summary:   Adam struggles in the cage as Lucifer imparts particularly sadistic torture on his older half-brother Sam in the cage in hell and as he fights his own psyche he finds himself transported to a beautiful space and supported by an unexpected ally that may have the potential to become far more than a formerly unwelcome visitor in his body. Or how the love story of Michael and Adam may have started.  Link to the fic on AO3: Does This Help?  Or read on below full fic posted under the keep reading bar.      <!-- more --> At first Adam was angry angry that Sam his goodie-two-shoes saving people hunting things older half-brother got them into this mess. Mess being the cage in the deepest reaches of hell where no normal demon even dared to set foot lest they be vaporized by Luciferâ€™s wrath that could reach beyond the cage but could not facilitate his freedom. That fact alone was all it took some days and on others he would lecture the cowering tall Winchester with the floppy brown hair about his life of failures.  The cage was a complete mind-fuck for the human psyche that much Adam knew to be true add to that the sharing of your own God-given body with an archangel who was about as warm and fluffy as a metal rod and you had a situation that was not only untenable it was bound to break anyone no matter how strong they were. Most days they acted like the neighbours who pretended that it wasnâ€™t their business that what happened over at the Jonesâ€™ was not their responsibility. However today Adam could not pretend could not compartmentalize himself away from Samâ€™s suffering.  Lucifer was imposing particularly sadistic tortures on the former hunter that was nothing more than a whimpering pet his soul long ago ripped frazzled and flailed into shreds of consciousness that may never be whole again even if they were saved by someone anyone today. He picked Sam apart body part by body part would only continue once his once perfect vessel would name the part removed out loud a psychological mind game that Sam had long ago been broken by as it meant he had a literal say in his torment continuing.  Adam was flustered anxious crying fitfully as every one of Samâ€™s pained noises ripped across his ear drums like nails on a chalkboard he wanted to jump out of his skin be anywhere but here and all of a sudden he was.  The scene reminded him of the one beach vacation his mom ever managed to make happen for them. Santa Monica beach in California he felt the sun warm on his skin heard the waves as they broke on the sandy shore and curled his toes in the sand to test that this was in fact real.  â€œIâ€™m afraid itâ€™s not 100% real but itâ€™s something I learned form my little brother Gabriel. Heâ€™d fabricate a world pocket with his grace make it move sound and feel just like the real thing.â€  â€œWhy would you take me here if we only have to go back to reality after all. You canâ€™t keep this up forever can you?â€  â€œNo but your body seemed â€¦ stressed like you were whatâ€™s the word; hyperventilating?â€  â€œI wasâ€œ he hoped Michael calling it his body and not their vessel counted for something.  â€œDoes this help would you like it to look different?â€ It was almost endearing to Adam how considerate Michael was trying to be.  â€œYes it does Michael thank you and no this is really niceâ€ little did Adam know that this gesture of protectiveness would be the first plot-point in a highly unconventional love story that would span over a thousand years.

It had been well over fifty years by now and over time Adam and Michael found a sort of truce with one another in that they were not surrendering to the ferocious but ultimately impotent anger of Lucifer nor did they subscribe to Samâ€™s wailing agonized suffering that seemed to dictate his every day of existence down here.  Most days they acted like the neighbours who pretended that it wasnâ€™t their business that what happened over at the Jonesâ€™ was not their responsibility. However today Adam could not pretend could not compartmentalize himself away from Samâ€™s suffering.  Lucifer was imposing particularly sadistic tortures on the former hunter that was nothing more than a whimpering pet his soul long ago ripped frazzled and flailed into shreds of consciousness that may never be whole again even if they were saved by someone anyone today. He picked Sam apart body part by body part would only continue once his once perfect vessel would name the part removed out loud a psychological mind game that Sam had long ago been broken by as it meant he had a literal say in his torment continuing.  Adam was flustered anxious crying fitfully as every one of Samâ€™s pained noises ripped across his ear drums like nails on a chalkboard he wanted to jump out of his skin be anywhere but here and all of a sudden he was.  The scene reminded him of the one beach vacation his mom ever managed to make happen for them. Santa Monica beach in California he felt the sun warm on his skin heard the waves as they broke on the sandy shore and curled his toes in the sand to test that this was in fact real.  â€œIâ€™m afraid itâ€™s not 100% real but itâ€™s something I learned form my little brother Gabriel. He liked to escape whenever the arguments between Luci and I got too loud for him. Heâ€™d fabricate a world pocket with his grace make it move sound and feel just like the real thing.â€  â€œWhy would you take me here if we only have to go back to reality after all. You canâ€™t keep this up forever can you?â€  â€œNo but your body seemed â€¦ stressed like you were whatâ€™s the word; hyperventilating?â€  â€œI wasâ€œ he hoped Michael calling it his body and not their vessel counted for something.  â€œDoes this help would you like it to look different?â€ It was almost endearing to Adam how considerate Michael was trying to be.  â€œYes it does Michael thank you and no this is really niceâ€ little did Adam know that this gesture of protectiveness would be the first plot-point in a highly unconventional love story that would span over a thousand years.

You and the Winchesters frequented second-hand shops; your clothing got ruined pretty often so you had to buy cheap. Thatâ€™s also why you wore so much flannel it was easy to find here.   <!-- more --> The boys hadnâ€™t joined you on this shopping trip so you were left to peruse the store without Dean getting onto you for 'getting distracted by the dead people stuffâ€™. I mean in your defense wasnâ€™t that kind of part of your job?  As you looked through the menâ€™s clothing for a replacement jacket for Sam something on one of the end caps caught your eye. You went over and picked up the deep emerald green suit tie. It reminded you of Deanâ€™s pretty green eyes.   In the years you had been hunting with the brothers you had developed quite a crush on the older Winchester. Crush? Letâ€™s face it. You were in love with him and you had alway loved his beautiful eyes.   You almost wanted to buy the tie for him. You rolled your eyes at the thought. Itâ€™s not like the boys were big on gift-giving. Debating for a moment you decided he could wear it with his 'fed threadsâ€™ â€as he called your fake FBI suits- and tossed it in the cart before you could second guess yourself.   â€œHoney Iâ€™m homeâ€ you greeted in a sing-song tone as you entered the motel room you were sharing with the boys.   Digging in your bag you handed Sam the jacket you had gotten him and he thanked you. Dean looked up from where he sat at the end of one of the beds cleaning his gun.   â€œI got you something tooâ€ you said dropping the tie onto the bed next to him.  He picked it up and looked at you with a brief look of confusion.   â€œIt matches your eyes.â€  Why did you say that? You internally cringed feeling the heat rise in your face. Instead of looking at him you stuffed your new clothes into you duffle bag.   â€œThanks Sweetheartâ€ Dean said a sweet smile gracing his lips.   â€œIâ€™m going to take a shower.â€ You hurried into the bathroom and shut the door behind you. Really you wanted to run away from this situation so he didnâ€™t see how flustered you were.   â€œAwwwâ€ Sam said in a mocking tone as soon as the bathroom door shut behind you.   You may have missed how Dean blushed when you said that but Sam didnâ€™t and he wasnâ€™t going to miss the opportunity to tease his older brother. He knew that Dean had had feeling for you for years but was too blind to realize that you felt the same.  â€œShut upâ€ Dean said brushing off his bothersâ€™ teasing. I finally feel okay to share the experience I had at the June SPNcon in Columbus. (I would have spoken earlier but I was still riding the high of meeting Misha and Jensen)   At the con it immediately felt weird that there was only one panel at a time. (Yes Iâ€™m aware of limited spacing and timings for photos and autos). At other conventions I have gone to thereâ€™s often two or more panels happening around the same time.  Also it was incredibly weird for a lady who was in her 50s to walk up to me after my Misha op and ask if I was flustered from meeting him. Like ma'am. He is literally older than my dad.  Finally some hellers/cockles shippers or just those who are obsessed with Misha and Jensen need to tone it down. Iâ€™m all for open expression in Fandom and shit but going to a con where youâ€™re meeting/seeing some of your favorite actors and wearing a shirt that says â€œmy ideal weight is Jensen ackles on top of meâ€ (as an example there were others) is strange. I would never do that at all but at least not around my idol.  The con was cool and I did ask Jensen during my autograph if he would slap batman (also asked Ice-T this) and he gave the most bewildered look and said no. The assistant next to him said yes so props to her.

I finally feel okay to share the experience I had at the June SPNcon in Columbus. (I would have spoken earlier but I was still riding the high of meeting Misha and Jensen)   At the con it immediately felt weird that there was only one panel at a time. (Yes Iâ€™m aware of limited spacing and timings for photos and autos). At other conventions I have gone to thereâ€™s often two or more panels happening around the same time.  Also it was incredibly weird for a lady who was in her 50s to walk up to me after my Misha op and ask if I was flustered from meeting him. Like ma'am. He is literally older than my dad.  Finally some hellers/cockles shippers or just those who are obsessed with Misha and Jensen need to tone it down. Iâ€™m all for open expression in Fandom and shit but going to a con where youâ€™re meeting/seeing some of your favorite actors and wearing a shirt that says â€œmy ideal weight is Jensen ackles on top of meâ€ (as an example there were others) is strange. I would never do that at all but at least not around my idol.  The con was cool and I did ask Jensen during my autograph if he would slap batman (also asked Ice-T this) and he gave the most bewildered look and said no. The assistant next to him said yes so props to her.

post_body: Do you ever think about how one of Samâ€™s closest friends let his abuser possess them and then had to deal with all of the ptsd flashbacks and suddenly didnâ€™t know how to feel safe around Cas because Cas had let his vessel be in use for Lucifer?  Do you ever think about how Samâ€™s brother the man he trusted most in this world helped trick an angel into controlling Samâ€™s body to help him heal and accidentally got Sam more hurt in the process?  Do you ever think about how John always made Sam feel so alone and isolated that he wanted to run away from a young age? That John taught Sam he was different and that made him a bad person?  Do you ever think about how Sam Winchester one of the strongest mortal/human characters on the show the tallest and smartest person in the world of Supernatural was taught incredibly young that his body wasnâ€™t his own?  That he was assaulted manipulated sexually and mentally abused maybe even physically if some of the headcanons about John are true.   And yetâ€¦â€¦he powers through. He has hope. He finds a life and love and happiness. He has low points and asks for help and tries god he tries to talk to his older brother about the things that upset him.   Heâ€™s the real miracle.
Who knows if itâ€™ll change the coming chaos but  Link

post_body: once in a while iâ€™ll see someone act like sam had a good (or even spoiled) childhood just because he had dean taking care of him and all i can think is are we talking about the same sam? the sam who wanted to get away from his family so badly as a child that his imaginary friend a real being with his best interest at heart was encouraging him to run away? the sam who was so miserable at home that the times he was able to get away became all of his best memories? thatâ€™s the sam weâ€™re saying had a good childhood?  dean may have done his best to care for sam and sam may express a lot of appreciation for that in hindsight but it doesnâ€™t change the fact that a kid is never going to be able to be a good primary caregiver to another kid. dean wasnâ€™t a father or mother to sam; mary was samâ€™s mom who was gone for good and john was samâ€™s dad who was gone most of the time and sam was a kid raised without real parental nurturance or really any kind of consistent support from an adult in his life. he may have had a brother who tried to fill that gap but that was always going to be a sisyphean task for a fellow child. dean being the closest thing he had to a good parent doesnâ€™t make his childhood better it just means he didnâ€™t have a good parent in his life at all because dean was never a parent much less a good one.  pretending dean did a great job raising sam and gave him a good childhood isnâ€™t any fairer to dean than it is to sam because the point isnâ€™t that dean did a good job the point is that dean never should have been given that job in the first place. he was a child with far more weight on his shoulders than he could reasonably be expected to handle and sam was a child abandoned by the person who actually should have been caring for him. both of them were neglected by the only family they had left and both of them suffered for it.

post_body: â€œNightmareâ€ 01x14 March 8 2011: Max Pacioretty get a concussion and a fractured neck from a hit by Zdeno Chara in to the stanchion. Pacioretty was neck braced and stretchered off this ice with no one knowing if he would play again. (spoiler alert: he does he is currently a free agent but was signed to the Caps last season.)  This hit went on to cause changes in all NHL arenas around the league. The now commonplace curved glass at the ends of the benches are because of this hit.   (photo credit: Paul Chiasson/Canadian press/associated press)

You rolled your eyes and dug some papers out of your bag handing them to him. â€œWhatâ€™s that?â€  â€œA campus map doofus and you orientation schedule. I told you to print it. Wifi on campus can be shittyâ€ you said.   â€œYes momâ€ he said making a show out of it.  â€œFreshman orientation is over in Jub Hall. Giant banner in front of it on the quad. Canâ€™t miss itâ€ said a guy walking past.   â€œThanksâ€ said Lonnie taking the papers and jogging off.   â€œIâ€™ll meet you back here for dinner!â€ you shouted.  â€œYeah see ya!â€ he said running off. You shook your head the guy smiling.  â€œItâ€™s a great school. Heâ€™ll like it hereâ€ said the young guy. You smiled taking a deep breath. â€œFirst one?â€  â€œHm?â€  â€œFirst kid at college?â€ You narrowed your eyes and dropped your jaw the guy swallowing.  â€œYou think Iâ€™m his mom? Iâ€™m his sister. He was being sarcastic.â€ You scoffed and headed back for the parking lot the guy groaning. â€œYeah I look old enough to be his mother thanks a lot.â€  â€œNo no I was thinking must have been a teenâ€¦â€ he trailed off as you spun around. â€œPregâ€¦â€  â€œOh so Iâ€™m not older just a teen mom. Got it.â€   â€œSorryâ€ he said. â€œI justâ€¦sorry.â€ He took off past you and you calmed down for a minute before walking to your car. You had to laugh when you saw the guy kicking a flat tire at the car next to yours. He looked up and sighed. â€œTodayâ€™s not my day.â€  â€œItâ€™s fine. I get itâ€ you said tossing a few empty boxes in the back of your SUV. â€œLonnie is my kid brother. I take care of him.â€  â€œI got a little brother myself. Heâ€™s in the law school here.â€  â€œMoving him in?â€  â€œNo. I uh I work here. Worked hereâ€ he said. â€œDepartment cuts.â€  â€œFor how much theyâ€™re charging tuition I would hope thatâ€™s not true.â€  â€œDidnâ€™t like the job very much anywaysâ€ he said.   â€œYou need a ride orâ€¦â€  â€œNah I got a spare in the trunk. Like I said just not my day.â€  â€œWell I have a feeling my brother is ditching me for dinner tonight. First roundâ€™s on me for your shitty day.â€  â€œIâ€™m the one that should be buying you one after assuming.â€  â€œYou can buy me one after. Unless youâ€™re gonna call me old again.â€ He smiled cocking his head. â€œDonâ€™t push it.â€  â€œElk Tavern has some pretty good food.â€  â€œElk Tavern is a very nice restaurant.â€  â€œGood. So youâ€™re local.â€  â€œNever said I wasnâ€™t. There you go assuming things again pretty boy.â€  â€œI assume we can get that drink over dinner?â€ You rolled your eyes leaning back against your car. â€œCome on. Eight.â€ You started to turn and head towards the door when you paused. â€œPut the reservation under Impala.â€  He smirked stepping aside as you backed out.   â€œWhatâ€™s your number? Or you know nameâ€ he asked when you shifted into drive. post_body: Doomsday by Lizzy McAlpine is literally Cas sacrificing himself for Dean and then Dean letting himself die a month later on that piece of rebar.  â€œDoomsday is close at hand/Iâ€™ll book the marching band/To play as you speak" is Billie chasing Dean and Cas through the bunker both of them knowing they donâ€™t have a way out of the situation.  â€œIâ€™ll feel like throwinâ€™ up/Youâ€™ll sit and stare/Like a goddamn machineâ€ is Dean watching Cas confess to him knowing that itâ€™s a goodbye and unable to stop it. Watching how Cas never looks scared or sad or disappointed or like heâ€™s expecting a response from Dean.  â€œIâ€™d like to plan out my part in this/But youâ€™re such a narcissist/Youâ€™ll probably do it next week/I donâ€™t get a choice in the matter/Why would I? Itâ€™s only the death of meâ€ This is Dean reflecting on the confession. Dean suppresses every feeling until it becomes anger so of course he is angry about Casâ€™ choice. He wishes he had a choice in what happened the opportunity to react to what Cas is saying or try and change the outcome of the situation but he didnâ€™t because Cas made his decision and in making that decision he made Deanâ€™s for him as well. And because Dean canâ€™t tell Cas how he feels or save him he feels like he died right alongside him.  â€œThe death of me was so quiet/No friends and family allowed/Only my murderer you and the priest/Who told you to go to Hellâ€ This is Dean after Casâ€™ death. He is the only one who knows what Casâ€™ sacrifice was the only one who truly knows what happened and what Cas gave for him. To everyone else Casâ€™ death was quiet and uneventful. But it killed Dean watching Cas die killed him in one way or another.  â€œAnd the funny thing is I wouldâ€™ve married you/If youâ€™d have stuck around/I feel more free than I have in years/Six feet in the groundâ€ This is Dean letting himself die on that rebar in the finale. He wanted to spend the rest of his life with Cas whether he has admitted to himself if thatâ€™s romantic or friendship and he canâ€™t imagine living the rest of his life without him. As he dies he finally feels free from his guilt and his grief. He thinks he might get to see Cas again.
Sam Winchester & John Winchester
